De esta manera podrá seguir teniendo una buena cantidad de clientes brindándoles una buena atención en su negocio, y así sus ingresos seguirán aumentando. Además, Luz Elena espera que sus hijos y su esposo puedan seguir teniendo una buena calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Luz Elena is married and has six children for whom she always tries to provide a good quality of life. About 25 years ago, she studied at a beauty school and learned how to cut and style hair. Since then, she has worked hard to generate income in order to contribute financially to the household expenses. Luz Elena previously had a beauty salon at a location where she generated many sales. However, she was eager to take care of her young children, so she moved the beauty salon into her house. She was able to maintain an established clientele for her business. By having the beauty salon in her house, Luz Elena was able to look after her children and provide them with a good quality of life. She wants her children to have constant support at home, so she is willing to keep her business at home so that she can continue looking after them.

Luz Elena is looking forward to replacing some of her work equipment, so she is seeking a loan as an opportunity to purchase a hair dryer and a professional curling iron. By replacing her equipment, she will be able to provide good service to the customers who visit her beauty salon. By continuing to have a good number of customers and providing them good service, Luz Elena's earnings will continue to increase. She also hopes that her children and her husband will continue experiencing a good quality of life and better financial opportunities to make progress.

loans.use: to buy a hair dryer and a professional curling iron.

loans.name: Mariana Luz

texts.es: Mariana Luz de cuarenta y siete años de edad vive junto a sus hijos en casa propia; ella posee una carpintería donde realiza junto a la ayuda de su hijo varón todo tipo de trabajos con madera, mesas, sillas, muebles, entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y es muy conocido por las personas el lugar pues su trabajo es de excelente calidad y lo elabora al gusto del cliente además de los precios bajos; Mariana es una mujer activa, emprendedora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, le gusta aprovechar cada oportunidad que se le presenta pues sabe que solo así alcanzara el éxito, en las últimas semanas tuvo pérdidas con un material defectuoso y desea recuperarse, quiere invertir de nuevo  y aumentar la producción pero necesita de un apoyo de capital, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar madera por mayor, clavos, pintura, barniz, etc. Mariana Luz es de excelente paga tiene muy buenas referencias crediticias y está segura que podrá cancelar el financiamiento a tiempo, a la vez tiene la esperanza de ofrécele a su familia seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Mariana Luz, 47, lives with her children in their own house. She has a carpentry shop where, with her son's help, she makes all kinds of items from wood: tables and chairs, among other things. She has had the business for years and is well known by the local people because the quality of her work is excellent and she makes items that meet her customers' wishes at low prices.

Mariana is an active, enterprising woman who wants to get ahead. She wants to take advantage of every opportunity that comes her way because she realizes this is the only way to succeed. In the past several weeks, she has taken losses on defective material and wants to make it up by reinvesting and increasing production; however, she needs capital. She is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy wholesale wood, nails, paint,  varnish, etc. Mariana Luz has a good credit history and good references and is sure that she will be able to make her loan payments on time. At the same time, she hopes to offer her family financial security.

loans.use: to buy wholesale wood, nails, paint, and varnish.

loans.name: Crisel Yesenia

texts.es: Crisel Yesenia de treinta y cinco años de edad vive junto a sus hijos y su mama; ella se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, tiene prendas en variedad camisas, pantalones, vestidos, blusas entre otros toda muy novedosa, además vende otros artículos como peluches y juguetes de bebe, su local está ubicado en el mercado de la zona  y es muy conocida, tiene mucha clientela porque saben que en su  negocio siempre encuentran lo que necesitan a precios accesibles y con producto de calidad, el servicio es excelente,  Crisel se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad; es una mujer decidida y muy trabajadora, siempre está en la búsqueda de nuevas oportunidades, piensa que el éxito no solo se logra con cualidades especiales, sino con elementos esenciales como la constancia y la organización; Crisel ha tenido buenos resultados con el negocio por eso se animó a invertir un  poco más pero necesita un apoyo de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. Crisel es responsable y tiene buenas referencias crediticias, sabe que  podrá cancelar el financiamiento con éxito y también tiene la esperanza que podrá darle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Crisel Yesenia, 35, lives with her children and her mother.  She sells women’s, children’s and men’s clothes.  She has a variety of shirts, pants, dresses and blouses among others; all are very stylish.  She also sells other items like stuffed toys and baby toys.  Her stand is located in the local market and is very well-known.  He has many customers because they know that they will find what they need at affordable prices and of good quality in her store and besides service is excellent.

Crisel is noted for her great kindness; she’s a woman who is determined and very hardworking.  She’s always looking for new opportunities and she believes that success isn’t only attained with special qualities but with essential elements like constancy and organization.

Crisel has had good results with the store which is why she’s venturing to invest a little more but needs capital support which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy clothes at wholesale.

Crisel is responsible and has good credit references.  She knows that she will be able to successfully repay the loan and also has the hope that she will be able to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy clothes at wholesale.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis wants a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for his farm. He is 45 years old, married with three children, and lives in Masindi, Uganda. He is a farmer and he raised money to buy his land by selling off some of his cows and goats. His dream is to educate his children, build a permanent house and buy a car, while his business dream is to venture into mechanized agriculture and export the products to nearby countries.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for his farm

loans.name: Yine Marisol

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Yine, tiene 47 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 29, 2 3 y 18 años de edad, el menor de ellos estudia en Universidad y dos de  ellos aun vive con ella. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura. Ella es licenciada en Ciencias De La Educación y también aprendió corte y confección en un centro en la ciudad.

Nuestra amiga trabaja de maestra en un colegio de la localidad pero también tiene un taller de costura en su casa,  allí ella se dedica a confeccionar todo tipo de ropa, trabaja a base de pedidos de personas particulares que saben de la calidad de sus trabajos. Trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 14h00 en el colegio y de allí hasta 22h00 en su taller aunque a veces se queda hasta más tarde si tiene que entregar alguna prenda, tiene 10 años con su taller y gracias a Dios le va muy bien. Ella también confecciona los uniformes para el colegio donde labora con lo cual en esa temporada asegura mucho trabajo.

Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar telas, hilos, botones y otros materiales para la costura. Lleva 9 años  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos son a muy bajos intereses.
 
Sus sueños son tener un taller más grande y seguir dando sus clases.
texts.en:
The “Amistad” communal bank meets every two weeks in the city of Tosagua.  This place is known for being very dynamic, and most of the inhabitants devote themselves to agriculture and raising animals.  It is an area with a lot of vegetation.

This is the place where we meet Yine, age 47.  She is married and they have three children, ages 29, 23, and 18.  The youngest child attends the university, and two of the children still live with her.  Her husband devotes himself to agriculture.   She has a degree in education, and she also learned dressmaking at a center in the city. 

Our friend works as a teacher at a local school.  However, she also has a seamstress shop in her house.  That is where she makes all types of clothes.  She works by orders from individuals who know the quality of her work.  She works every day from 6:00 a.m. until 2:00 p.m. at the school.  Then she works until 8:00 p.m. in her shop.  Although, at time, she stays until later if she needs to deliver a garment.  

She has had her shop for ten years, and thanks to God, it is going very well for her.  She also makes uniforms for the school where she works.  This assures her of a lot of work during the school season.

She will use this new loan to buy fabric, thread, buttons, and other sewing materials.  She has been in her communal bank for nine years.  She likes it because the loans have a very low interest rate.  Her dreams are to have a larger shop and to continue teaching.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, buttons, and other sewing materials

loans.name: Dolores Rosario

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Dolores, tiene 54 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura. Lleva 15 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque con los créditos se ayuda para salir adelante.

Nuestra amiga con intención de poder obtener sus propios ingresos y con esto ayudar con los gasto que genera mantener el hogar empezó un negocio en su casa, ella con la ayuda de su esposo construyo un galpón de pollos para la  cría, nos cuenta que actualmente mete hasta 200 pollos los mismo que los mantiene de dos a tres meses y  luego de este tiempo los entrega a comerciantes que llegan hasta su casa. Además también utilizan parte del crédito para los cultivos de maíz, yuca y verduras que tiene su esposo.

Este crédito es para comprar pollos, medicinas, alimentos para los pollos así como para pagar mano de obra en la recolección de la cosecha.
 
Sus sueños son seguir aumentado su granja y vender más pollos.
texts.en:
In the city of Tosagua the communal bank Amistad meets every fifteen days. This place is known for being very dynamic, where the majority of its inhabitants make a living farming and raising animals due to it being an area with a lot of vegetation.

In this place we meet Dolores who's 54 years old. She's married and from this relationship has two children who are of age and independent. Her husband makes a living farming. She's been with the communal bank for 15 years and likes it because with the loans it helps her to get ahead.

Our friend began a business in her home with the intention of being able to obtain her own income and with this help with the expense in keeping up her home. With the help of her husband she built a chicken coop for raising chicken and tells us that currently up to 200 chicken fit, which she supports for two to three months and after hands over to merchants that come to her home. Moreover, they also use part of the loan to grow corn, yucca, and vegetables her husband has.

This loan is to buy chicken, medicine, and food for the chicken, as well as to pay for labor to collect the harvest.

Her dreams are to continue growing her farm and selling more chicken.

loans.use: to buy chicken, food, and medicine for the chicken, and pay for labor.

loans.name: Xiomara Cristina

texts.es: Xiomara Cristina, trabaja como comerciante informal, se dedica a la venta de ropa como pantalones, camisas, faldas, ropa de niños, calzado y productos plásticos. Razón por la cual es muy conocida en su comunidad, además de ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y honesta. A sus 29 años, Xiomara Cristina vive en casa propia con sus padres, y sus 3 hijos, de 8, 6 y 4 años de edad. Su esposo tuvo que emigrar a Estados Unidos, buscando una mejor vida para la familia, por lo que mensualmente envía una remesa. Su padre es agricultor, y contribuye con esto a los gastos del hogar. Xiomara Cristina, debe hacer un gran esfuerzo por brindar a sus hijos lo necesario para los estudios y manutención. Por ésta razón, ella solicita este préstamo que le permita invertir en la compra de productos para la venta (pantalones, camisas, faldas, ropa para niños, calzado, etc.), con lo que considera que logrará mayor estabilidad en los ingresos de su negocio, lo cual le proporcionará seguridad y estabilidad económica, a ella y a su familia.
texts.en: Xiomara Cristina works as an informal business woman. She sells clothes such as trousers, shirts, skirts, kids' clothes, shoes, and plastic goods. For this reason, she is very well known in the community. What is more, she is a very hardworking, responsible, and honest woman. 29 year old Xiomara lives in her own home with her parents and her 3 children who are 8, 6, and 4 years old. Her husband had to emigrate to the United States to seek a better life for the family, and he sends home money every month. Her father is a farmer and he helps with the household expenses. Xiomara Cristina strives hard to offer her children what they need for their studies and maintenance. For this reason, she is requesting a loan that will enable her to buy goods to sell (trousers, shirts, skirts, kids' clothes, shoes, etc.). She believes that this will help her to achieve greater stability in her business profits, which will provide economic stability for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, kids' clothes, shoes, etc.

loans.name: Miriam Del Rosario

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Miriam, tiene 36 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 15, 11 y 2 años de edad,  las dos mayores estudian en colegio y escuela. Su esposo es comerciante.

Nuestra amiga junto con el esposo tienen un negocio de venta de ropa y bisutería, ellos instalan un kiosco en el centro de la ciudad en el cual ofrecen sus productos. Trabajan todos los  días desde las 8h00 hasta las 18h00,  venden al contado y a crédito pero solo a clientes que son bien conocidos, para surtirse de mercadería su esposo viaja cada quince días a la ciudad de Guayaquil lugar donde consigue más variedad y a mejor precio. Tienen 8 años con su negocio y les va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar ropa y bisutería. Lleva 7 años  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos salen rápido y sin tantos requisitos.
 
Su sueño es tener un almacén con un local fijo.
texts.en:
The “Amistad” communal bank meets every two weeks in the city of Tosagua.  This place is known for being very dynamic, where most of the inhabitants devote themselves to agriculture and raising animals.  It is an area with a lot of vegetation.

This is where we meet Miriam, age 36.  She is married, and they have three children, ages 15, 11, and 2.  The two older children go to school.  Her husband is a merchant.

Our friend and her husband have a business selling clothes and jewelry.  They set up a kiosk in the center of the city, and that is where they offer their products.  They work every day from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  They sell for cash.  They also sell for credit, but only to customers that are well-known.  

Her husband travels to Guayaquil every 15 days to stock up on merchandise.  That is where he gets more variety and a better price.  They have had the business for eight years, and it is going very well for them.

This loan is to buy clothes and jewelry.  She has been in her communal bank for seven years.  She likes it because you can get loans quickly and without so many requirements.  Her dream is to have a store with a fixed location.

loans.use: to buy clothes and jewelry.

loans.name: Orfelia Del Carmen

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.

En este lugar vive la señora Orfelina, tiene 61 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene seis hijos todos mayores de edad, una hija vive en su casa. El marido trabaja en un comedor.
 
Nuestra amiga es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de productos Avon (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Los mismos que vende puerta a puerta, ella trabaja todos los  días ya que  en su casa tiene una pequeña granja de pollos en la cual mete hasta 100 pollos por temporada con lo cual se gana algo extra sin salir de su casa. Tiene más de 8  años que se dedica a sus ventas y a la granja de pollos.

Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos, alimento y medicinas para los pollos. Lleva más de 10 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan los créditos.
 
Sus sueños son seguir adelante y buena salud ante todo.
texts.en:
The “Amistad” communal bank meets every two weeks in the city of Tosagua.  This place is known for being very dynamic, where most of the inhabitants devote themselves to agriculture and raising animals.  It is an area with a lot of vegetation.

This is where Orfelina, age 61, lives.  She is in a common-law marriage, and they have six adult children.  One daughter lives in her house.  Her husband works at a restaurant.

Our friend is a housewife.  She sells Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume, and women’s accessories) in order to get her own resources to use to help her husband with the household expenses.  She sells the Avon products door to door.

She works every day because she has a small chicken farm at her house.   She can have up to 100 chickens on the farm per season.  This way she earns something extra without leaving home.  She has been selling Avon products for eight years, and she has had the chicken farm for the same amount of time.

This loan is to buy perfume, creams, and cosmetics, and to buy feed, and medicine for the chickens.  She has been in her communal bank for over ten years.  She likes it because of the help of the loans.  Her dreams are to get ahead, and, above all, to have good health.

loans.use: to buy perfume, creams, and cosmetics, and to buy feed, and medicine for the chickens.

loans.name: Dan

texts.en: Dan wants a loan to complete building his house. He is 30 years old and lives in Masindi, Uganda. He is married and charged with the responsibility of taking care of his two children. He started as a newspaper vendor, saved money, and opened a retail shop. His family dream is to educate his children, buy a motorcycle, and own a wholesale shop.

loans.use: to complete building his house.

loans.name: Maria Marta

texts.es: María Marta de setenta años de edad vive junto a su hija en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas en el lugar de su residencia, tiene muchos años de elaborarlas por lo que tiene mucha experiencia y rapidez , es muy conocida en la zona pues vende las tortillas más ricas y calientitas, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo elabora con material de primera calidad y lo vende a precio accesible, además María siempre está delante de la competencia por su excelente servicio; es una mujer muy activa y trabajadora a pesar de su avanzada edad, siempre está dispuesta a aprovechar cada oportunidad que se le presenta, últimamente ha aumentado la demanda y necesita aumentar la inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, gas propano, etc. María Marta ya tiene experiencia crediticia y es muy responsable con los pagos, por eso asegura que con las ganancias de su negocio podrá cancelar el financiamiento con éxito y al mismo tiempo podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Marta, 70, lives with her daughter in their own house. She sells tortillas from her home. She has been making tortillas for many years, and therefore, is very experienced and fast. She is well known in the neighborhood because her tortillas are the most delicious and always warm. She has many customers because everyone knows she makes her tortillas from high quality products and sells them at reasonable prices. In addition, Maria provides better service than her competitors.

Despite her age, Maria is active and hardworking. She is always prepared to take advantage of opportunities that present themselves. Recently, demand has increased, and she needs to invest more. She is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to to buy wholesale maize, propane gas, etc. María Marta already has a credit history and is a responsible borrower. She assures us that she can successfully pay the loan from her business profits. At the same time, she will be able to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale maize and propane gas.

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es: Claudia, de 25 años de edad, es estudiante universitaria, y se dedica a la venta de tortillas y venta de productos por catálogo. Vive en casa propia, junto a su mamá, quien le ayuda en el negocio de la venta de tortillas. Claudia tiene muchos deseos de superarse académicamente, y finalizar su carrera universitaria, por lo que necesita un préstamo que le permita invertir en las fuentes de ingreso que posee actualmente, para la venta de tortillas requiere invertir en maíz, leña, gas, cal; y para la venta de productos por catálogo, considera que con un préstamo podría adquirir lociones, cremas y productos cosméticos. Claudia considera que con una mayor inversión en materias primas y artículos para la venta, conseguirá los ingresos necesarios para lograr sus metas ya que desea poder tener acceso a una calidad de vida diferente a la ha tenido junto a sus padres. Espera que con su trabajo y la ayuda de esta institución pueda lograr su sueño.
texts.en: 25 year old Claudia is a university student and she works selling tortillas and products from a catalog. She lives at home with her mother who helps her with the tortilla business. Claudia very much wants to succeed academically and to finish her university course. For this reason, she needs a loan to invest in her current sources of income. For the tortilla business, she needs to buy corn, wood, gas, and lime; and for the catalog business, she thinks that she will use the loan to buy lotions, creams, and cosmetics. Claudia believes that a greater investment in raw materials and goods to sell will bring her the income she needs to achieve her goals as she wants to achieve a quality of life different to that which her parents have had. She hopes that, through her work and the help of this institution, she will be able achieve her dream.

loans.use: to buy corn, wood, gas, lime, as well as lotions, creams, and cosmetic goods.

loans.name: David

texts.en: David is a forty-six-year old married man with six children living in Masindi, Uganda. He has sole responsibility for looking after his family. He operates a retail shop and this has enabled him to pay his children's school fees. His dream is to educate his children and have a happy family. Inadequate capital hinders his business but he would like to have a wholesale shop in the future. David wants a loan to buy sugar, soap, salt and bread to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, soap, salt and bread to sell

loans.name: Innocent

texts.en: Innocent wants a loan to pay school fees for his brothers. He is a farmer and the sector has been lucrative since he has been able to buy more land to expand his farming activities. He also has a herd of cattle, and he supplies milk to most hotels in the Masindi district. His dream is to educate his siblings and buy land to grow more crops, despite the challenges of theft and pests. He is a teacher by profession and his salary helps him in funding his projects.

loans.use: to pay school fees

loans.name: Angela Lucia

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Angela, tiene 52 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos, todos mayores de edad que viven en su casa pero de forma independiente. Su esposo es operador de maquinaria pesada.

Nuestra amiga para obtener sus propios recursos hace  mas de 14 años surtió una pequeña tienda en su casa, allí vende todo tipo de productos, como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, carnes, verduras y frutas.  Trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, su esposo le ayuda en su trabajo sobretodo en las tardes cuando él está desocupado, lleva más de 14 años con su negocio y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Lleva 14 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque con el primer crédito empezó su negocio.

Su meta es seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
In the city of Tosagua the communal bank Amistad meets every fifteen days. This place is known for being very dynamic, where the majority of its inhabitants make a living farming and raising animals due to it being an area with a lot of vegetation.

In this place we meet Angela who's 52 years old. She's married and from this relationship has four children, all of whom are of age and who live in her home but in an independent way. Her husband is a heavy machinery operator.

For more than fourteen years our friend has supplied a small store in her home in order to obtain her own resources. There she sells all types of products like rice, sugar, oils, detergent, legumes, meat, vegetables, and fruit. She works every day from 6am to 8pm, sometimes until later. Her husband helps her with her work, above all in the afternoon when he isn't busy. She's had her business for more than 14 years and things are going very well for her.

She is going to use this loan to stock up her store and buy rice, sugar, oil, detergent, sausage, and other basic necessities. She's been with the communal bank for fourteen years and likes it because with her first loan she began her business.

Her goal is to move forward with her business and grow it more each day.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, detergent, sausage, and other basic necessities.

loans.name: Buhara Group United

texts.en: Joseph used the previous loan to buy cassava flour and cooking oil, among other items, for his retail shop. The 47-year-old man says he has benefited a lot from being a member of the above-mentioned group. He faces challenges of price fluctuation and inadequate capital to meet the high demand, but his dream is to have a wholesale shop that can sustainably supply the western region of the country. Joseph intends to buy bananas with the loan.

loans.use: to buy bananas to sell.

loans.name: Reyna

texts.es: Reyna de cuarenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su hijo en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras en variedad melones, papaya, plátanos, tomates, cebolla, chiles, entre otros, ella vende de forma ambulante en un vehículo por diferentes zonas del país aledañas a la localidad donde reside, es muy conocida y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues vende la fruta y verdura más fresca, económica y de buena calidad además el servicio es inigualable Reyna se caracteriza por su amabilidad y por su excelente habilidad en el comercio; es una mujer ejemplar trabaja duro desde muy temprano para llevar el sustento al hogar, le gusta mantener al tanto de nuevas oportunidades para no desaprovechar ninguna, piensa que su más grande secreto es la motivación y el amor que tiene por su labor, sabe que eso la llevara lejos en un futuro; su negocio ha tomado un gran auge por lo que quiere aumentar la inversión pero su capital no le alcanza por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tomates, cebolla, plátanos, melones, chiles por mayor, etc. Reyna tiene buenas referencias crediticias ha tenido varios financiamientos y los ha cancelado con éxito, por eso asegura que podrá pagar con puntualidad, a la vez tiene fe que podrá darle a su familia la vida que se merecen.
texts.en: 46 year old Reyna lives with her son in her own home. She works selling fruit and vegetables such as melons, papaya, bananas, tomatoes, onion, chiles, and others. She sells traveling from place to place in her vehicle, traveling to the different regions of the country surrounding the place where she lives. She is very well known and she has built-up a good customer base as she sells the freshest, most economical, and high-quality fruit and vegetables and offers unequaled service. Reyna is characterized by her kindness and her excellent business skills. She is an exemplary woman, working hard from very early in the morning so she can put food on the table. She likes to keep abreast of new opportunities so that she doesn't miss any chances. She thinks that her secret of success is her motivation and the love that she has for her work. She knows that this will take her far in the future. Her business has seen a big upswing, so she wants to invest more in stock, but her working capital isn't sufficient. So, she has asked INTEGRAL for a loan to buy tomatoes, onions, bananas, melons, and chiles in bulk. Reyna has good credit references and has had various loans before and has repaid them successfully. So, she is sure that she will be able to pay punctually and she has faith that she will be able to give her family the life that they deserve.

loans.use: to buy tomatos, onion, bananas, melons, and chiles in bulk.

loans.name: Fridah

texts.en:
Fridah is a mother of one child aged 13. She has been in farming for five successive years in her rural home area in the Nkubu area of central Kenya, where she also runs a retail shop to supplement her farming income.

Fridah has requested a loan of 60,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) from Juhudi Kilimo to buy a water tank at 40,000 KES and irrigation pipes at 20,000 KES. She hopes these items will help supply her farm (more specifically, her banana farm) with sufficient water and improve her farming income, which she will mostly channel into educating her child. She plans to buy more land to make her banana farming business much bigger in the near future.

Fridah, however, sees challenges in the high costs of farming inputs, as well as high labour costs charged by farmhands who are engaged on a casual basis.

loans.use: To buy a water tank and irrigation pipes

loans.name: Neftaly Omar

texts.es: Neftaly Omar, es muy conocido como un hombre trabajador, responsable y amable en la zona donde  habita. Gracias a su buen desempeño en su trabajo ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus vecinos los cuales expresan estar muy satisfechos con el servicio que él ofrece. El señor Neftaly, posee una panadería en la cual trabaja duramente para percibir los ingresos necesarios para el mantenimiento de su hogar. Lleva muchos años administrando la panadería. Su negocio le ha permitido llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Junto con su esposa buscan la forma de mejorar la situación económica en la que se encuentran. Para paliar un poco la situación y darle un impulso a su negocio. Ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución para solicitar préstamo que le permita adquirir la materia prima necesaria (harina) para la elaboración del delicioso pan. Y poder continuar recibiendo los frutos de su negocio para el mantenimiento de su hogar y familia.
texts.en: Neftaly Omar is very well-known in the area where he lives as a hardworking, responsible, and nice man. Thanks to the good performance in his work he knows how to win his neighbors' trust who express being very satisfied with the service he offers. Neftaly has a bakery at which he works hard to receive the necessary income to support his home. He's been managing his bakery for many years and his business has allowed him to put food on the table every day. Together with his wife they are searching for a way to improve the financial situation in which they find themselves. To ease the situation a little and give his business a boost he's made the decision to come to this institution to request a loan that will allow him to obtain the necessary raw materials (flour) to make delicious bread and be able to continue receiving the fruit of his business in order to support his home and family.

loans.use: to buy flour.

loans.name: Samson

texts.en:
Samson is aged 54 years and is married with six children; three are adults, with the other three still being minors and in school. He has been in farming for 10 years and currently produces maize, bananas, and eggs for the local markets.

Samson has requested a loan of 60,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy more poultry birds and expand his poultry housing unit. He hopes to improve the poultry business and later use the income generated from poultry farming to venture into dairy farming as well.

Samson laments of high costs of farm inputs, but he appreciates Juhudi Kilimo's financial support for smallholder farmers.

loans.use: To buy poultry birds

loans.name: Silveria

texts.en:
Silveria is aged 50 and has been in farming since she was 20 years old. She is married with three children aged between 25 and 12 years. Her farm produces coffee, tea, pineapples, milk, and bananas for the local markets. She runs a retail shop and a restaurant in the local market for additional income.

Silveria has requested a loan of 60,000 KES from Kiva partner Juhudi Kilimo to expand her dairy farming business by constructing a bigger and more modern dairy unit for her dairy animals. She hopes her milk production will improve and plans to continue increasing the number of her cows for better income, which will enable her to build a modern house for her family.

She, however, laments of high costs of animal feed and labour charges by the farmhands. She is happy with Juhudi Kilimo's loan services for smallholder farmers.

loans.use: To expand her dairy unit

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: Lidia de cincuenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos, ella posee una venta de tamales y verduras en el lugar donde vive, vende los tamales más ricos de la zona, de pollo y de gallina, además vende la verdura fresca tomate, cebolla, chile entre otros; tiene varios años de tener su pequeño negocio y le ayuda con los gastos del hogar, todo lo que comercia es de calidad y a buenos precios los clientes la prefieren porque siempre encuentran lo que necesitan; Lidia es una mujer trabajadora, humilde pero sobre todo muy visionaria quiere salir adelante y triunfar, cada día las personas conocen más de su negocio y ha aumentado la demanda y para no decepcionar a la clientela quiere invertir más por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar pollo, hojas de mata de guineo para emboltura, maíz, papas, tomates, chiles, cebollas etc. Lidia tiene capacidad crediticio por eso asegura que podrá saldar la deuda, y a la vez tiene la confianza que llevará a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: 52 year old Lidia lives with her partner and their children. She has a business selling tamales and vegetables in the place where she lives. She sells the tastiest tamales in the area. She makes chicken tamales as well as selling fresh tomatoes, onion, chiles, and other vegetables. She has had her little business for some years and it helps with the household expenses. Everything she sells is of high quality and at a good price and her customers like her business because they can always find what they need. Lidia is a hardworking woman and humble, but, above all, she is visionary and she wants to be successful. Every day, more people get to know her business and demand has grown. In order to not disappoint her customers, she wants to invest in more stock and for this reason she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will enable her to buy chicken, banana leaves for wrapping, corn, potatoes, tomatoes, chiles, onions, etc. Lidia has credit capacity that ensures that she will be able to pay her debt and, at the same time, she is confident that she will be able to achieve economic security for her home.

loans.use: to buy chicken, leaves for wrapping tamales, corn, potatoes, tomatoes, chiles, and onions.

loans.name: Alfred

texts.en:
Alfred is a father of two children, with the firstborn being 10 years old and the second-born only 8 months old. He is himself aged 37 and has been in active farming for 13 years. His farm produces tea, coffee, bananas, and milk, which he sells to the local market. Besides farming, he gets additional income from his retail shop business in the local market.

Alfred has requested a loan of 60,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) from Kiva partner Juhudi Kilimo to buy water pipes for irrigating his farm (at 40,000 KES) and also to buy a chaff-cutter to help in feeding his dairy animals. He expects improved income, which he will use to improve his family's living standards and educate his children.

Alfred says the lack of farming capital, coupled with poor market prices for the farm products, has always been his greatest challenge.

loans.use: To buy water pipes for irrigation and a chaff-cutter

loans.name: Rosa Esperanza

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Rosa, tiene 60 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos todos mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun vive en su casa. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura.

Nuestra amiga tiene en su casa una pequeña graja de pollos, ella compra hasta 200 en una avícola en el centro de la ciudad, los cría por cerca de tres meses y luego cuando ya tienen un peso adecuado ella entrega a comerciantes del lugar, vende por libras en su casa o entrega también en ciertas tiendas de la ciudad, nos cuenta que sus clientes le compran ya que ella además de la comida que les da a sus pollos también los cría con maíz por lo cual su sabor es parecido a la gallina criolla. Ella le da parte del dinero del crédito a su esposo para que él lo utilice en sus cultivos, él necesita pagar la mano de obra para recoger la cosecha de maíz.

Este crédito es para comprar pollos, medicinas y alimento para sus pollos y  pagar mano de obra de la cosecha de su marido. Lleva 13 años  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan los créditos.
 
Sus sueños son seguir adelante y algún dia tener una tienda.
texts.en:
The “Amistad” communal bank meets every two weeks in the city of Tosagua.  This place is known for being very dynamic, where most of the inhabitants devote themselves to agriculture and raising animals.  It is an area with a lot of vegetation.

This is where we meet Rosa, age 60.  She is married, and they have four adult children.  One of them still lives in her house.  Her husband devotes himself to agriculture.

Our friend has a small chicken farm at her house.   She buys up to 200 chickens at a poultry market in the city.  She raises them for three months.  Then, when they have reached an adequate weight, she delivers them to merchants in her area, sells them by the pound at her house, or she also delivers to certain stores in the city.  She tells us that her customers buy from her because, in addition to the feed she gives her chickens, she raises them on corn, which gives them the flavor of free-range chickens.

She will give part of the money from the loan to her husband to use on his crops.  He needs to pay for the labor to collect the corn harvest.  

She will use this loan to buy chickens, medications, and feed for her chickens.  She will also pay for the labor for her husband’s harvest.  She has been in her communal bank for 13 years.  She likes it because of the help that the loans give.

Her dreams are to get ahead and to one day have a store.

loans.use: to buy chickens, medications, and feed for her chickens, and to pay for the labor for her husband’s harvest.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es: Francisca, de 49 años de edad, vive en casa de su propiedad, con su esposo de 44 años de edad. Además vive con su hija y yerno, quienes ayudan con la economía del hogar. El esposo de Francisca es albañil, y ella es comerciante informal, que se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad, tales como frutas, verduras, granos básicos y abarrotes, bebidas gaseosas y endulzadas, y otros productos alimenticios y de higiene. Debido a que Francisca y su esposo, se dedican al trabajo informal, es difícil para ellos la obtención de los ingresos mensuales necesarios fijos para lograr la estabilidad económica, que les garantice acceso a bienes y servicios de primera necesidad. Por ésta razón, Francisca solicita este préstamo a INTEGRAL que le permita invertir en la adquisición de más productos de primera necesidad como: frutas, verduras, bebidas gaseosas y endulzadas, granos básicos, productos de limpieza, etc. Para la venta en su negocio, con lo cual espera atraer a más clientes e incrementar sus ingresos para optar a mejores condiciones de vida para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Francisca, 49, lives in her own house with her husband, 44.  She also lives with her daughter and son-in-law, who help with the household finances.

Francisca's husband is a bricklayer and she sells in the informal sector.  She sells convenience items such as fruit, vegetables, basic grains and groceries, sodas and sweetened drinks, and other food and hygiene products.  Because Francisca and her husband work in the informal sector, it's difficult for them to get the fixed monthly income necessary to achieve the economic stability that guarantees them access to essential goods and services.

For this reason Francisca is requesting this loan from Integral that will allow her to invest in acquiring more convenience products to sell in her store, such as fruit, vegetables, sodas and sweetened drinks, basic grains, cleaning products, etc.  She hopes this will attract more customers and increase her income to have better living conditions for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy fruit, vegetables, sodas and sweetened beverages, basic grains, cleaning products, etc.

loans.name: Futuro De Vida  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Futuro de Vida está formado por 7 socias y 1 socio quienes laboran a diario en diferentes actividades económicas las mismas que les permiten aportar la economía de sus hogares y salir adelante con sus familias, son personas amables, gentiles que mantienen su cultura y tradiciones. Viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, su gastronomía cautiva el paladar de quienes la visitan y su gente aun mantienen su cultura y tradiciones.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. María de Lourdes, tiene 30 años de edad, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido un hijo de 2 años de edad. Su esposo labora en un taller de latonería (arreglo de latas vehículos), no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando. 

Doña María de Lourdes se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y en los tiempos libres  se dedica a la venta de una gran variedad de cosméticos, se encuentra en este negocio hace un año y medio y labora de domingo a domingo. También hace un año se dedica a fabricar guaipe.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 3 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cosméticos para aumentar su mercadería. 

Su meta es  tener su un negocio de venta de comida rápida.
texts.en:
The village bank Futuro de Vida is made up of 7 women and 1 man who work daily at different businesses that allow them to support their homes and help their families make progress. They are friendly and kind people who maintain their culture and traditions. They live in different parts of the city of Cuenca, which was declared an UNESCO World Heritage Center in December of 1999. Their cuisine captivates the palate of all who visit, and the people still maintain their culture and traditions.

One of the members of this group is Maria de Lourdes, 30, who is married and has a 2-year-old son. Her husband works in a tinsmith's workshop (fixing cars). The don't own a home and so they rent. 

Maria de Lourdes is a housewife, and in her free time she sells a variety of cosmetics. She has been doing this business for a year and a half and works every day. She also has been making cotton rags for a year.

She has been in the bank for 3 years. Her new loan will be invested in the purchase of cosmetics to increase her merchandise.

Her goal is to have a business selling fast food.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Tito Balmore

texts.es: Tito Balmore, tiene 24 años de edad y habita junto a su madre de 56 años en casa de su propiedad. Su madre le ayuda con los gastos del hogar, dado que mensualmente recibe remesas. Tito no tuvo la oportunidad de terminar sus estudios, razón por la cual opto por aprender el oficio de estilista, lo que le permite ganarse  la vida honradamente. Es así como hace algunos años comenzó con un salón de belleza en su hogar de habitación. Realiza variedad de funciones como: cortes, tintes, maquillaje, lavados, planchados, etc. Muchas personas lo prefieren ya que en su negocio encuentran buen servicio y buenos precios. Para Tito lo más importante es que sus clientes se vayan satisfechos con el servicio que reciben. Este negocio es el que le permite ganarse la vida ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Para incrementar el movimiento de su salón de belleza ha tomado la decisión de invertir en la compra de tintes, químicos, cosméticos, ya que así lo esta demandando su clientela, y así ofrecer un  mejor servicio. Dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos, decidió solicitar este préstamo a INTEGRAL para hacer dicha inversión. Prevé que con su trabajo y la ayuda de esta institución podrá mejorar el movimiento de negocio mismo que brindará lo necesario para cancelar la obligación por asumir y además mejorar su situación económica y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Tito Balmore is 24 years old and lives with his 56 year old mother in her home.  Her mother helps out with the household expenses, as she receives remittances every month.  Tito did not have the opportunity to finish his education so he decided to learn the trade of stylist, which allows him to earn an honest living.  He started his beauty salon in his home a few years ago.  He provides various services including cuts, tints, makeup, washes, presses, etc.  Many people prefer him because he provides good service at good prices.  The most important thing for Tito is that his customers leave satisfied with their services.  This business allows him to earn a living because he doesn’t have another source of income.

He has decided to expand his beauty salon and buy tints, chemicals, and cosmetics, now that he is getting more customer demands and wants to provide better service.  He decided to request a loan through INTEGRAL since he doesn’t have the money to make this investment.  He expects that through his work and this loan, he will be able to increase his business and be able to repay the loan and also improve his family’s financial situation.

loans.use: to buy supplies

loans.name: Jose Julio

texts.es: José Julio de sesenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su hijo, en casa propia él se dedica a la venta de maíz y a la fabricación de mesas, tiene varios años con su pequeño negocio y es muy conocido en la zona pues saben que todo lo que comercia y elabora es de primera calidad y a precios realmente accesibles además que el servicio es excelente; José es un hombre mayor muy entusiasta y trabajador, siempre se encuentra motivado a buscar nuevas oportunidades que le permitan ganarse un futuro mejor, desde hace varios meses quería invertir para mejorar sus ganancias y llamar a nuevos clientes pero debido a perdidas anteriores no poseía el capital suficiente por eso hoy le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor y madera, etc. José Julio tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar con éxito su financiamiento, ya que posee experiencia crediticia y excelentes referencias, a la vez tiene seguridad que podrá darle a su familia la vida que se merecen.
texts.en:
José Julio, 66, lives with his son in his own house.  He sells corn and manufactures tables.  He’s had his small business for several years and is very well-known in the zone because they know that everything he sells and makes is of top quality and prices are truly affordable and service is excellent besides.  

José is a very enthusiastic, hardworking older man who is always motivated to find new opportunities that will allow him to earn a better future.  He’s wanted to invest in order to improve his profits for several months now but due to previous losses did not have sufficient capital to do so which is why today he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn at wholesale and wood, etc.  

José Julio is sure that he will be able to successfully repay the loan because he has credit experience and excellent references.  At the same time, he’s sure that he will be able to give his family the life they deserve.

loans.use: to buy corn and wood.

loans.name: Alba Mónica

texts.es: Alba Mónica de treinta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su hijo y su madre; ella se dedica a la venta de comida rápida, vende tortas, hamburguesas, hotdog, jugos, gaseosas entre otros, el negocio está ubicado en el lugar de su residencia , es muy conocida en la zona pues todo lo que elabora es exquisito y ocupa los materiales de primera calidad y todo lo vende a precios accesibles,  además que es el servicio más rápido y el lugar es muy higienico, Alba es muy mujer que trabajadora, le encanta cocinar, por eso toda su labor la realiza con gran entusiasmo y amor, es muy inteligente y le gusta aprovechar las oportunidades que se le presentan, tiene muchas ideas para ampliar el negocio y alcanzar el éxito y para empezar quiere aumentar la producción por eso necesita solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar carnes, embutidos, verduras, aderezos, bebidas, etc. Alba Mónica tiene excelentes referencias  crediticias y es muy responsable con los crédito por tiene la certeza que podrá canelar cada uno de los pagos de la deuda, a la vez sabe que podrá darle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Alba Mónica, 34, lives with her son and her mother.  She sells fast-food: sandwiches, hamburgers, hotdogs, juices and soft-drinks, among others.  Her business is located at home.  She’s very well-known in the zone because everything she makes is delicious; she uses only top quality ingredients and sells everything at affordable prices.  Besides, service is quick and the place is very hygienic.

Alba is a very hardworking woman who loves to cook which is why she does all her work with great enthusiasm and love.  She is very intelligent and likes to take advantage of opportunities that present themselves.  She has many ideas for expanding the business and attain success and to begin to do so she wants to increase production and needs an INTEGRAL loan to buy meats, cured meats, vegetables, dressings, beverages, etc.

Alba Mónica has excellent credit references and is very responsible with the loans because she’s certain that she will be able to make very one of the loan’s installment payments and also knows that at the same time she will be able to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy meat, cured meats, vegetables, dressings and beverages.

loans.name: Fridah

texts.en:
Fridah is a farmer in the Nkubu area of Central Kenya. She has been in active farming for 10 years and currently runs her farm with the help of one farmhand. She produces tea, milk, coffee, bananas, and poultry products as well. She is married with two children aged twelve and four years.

Fridah has requested a loan of 60,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to help her build a zero-grazing unit for 40,000 KES and buy poultry birds for 20,000 KES. She says this will give a boost to her farming income and help her improve her family's living standards and build a decent residential house for the family.

Fridah commends Juhudi Kilimo for efficiency in loan processing but says her major challenges in the farming business emanate from the high costs of labour for farmhands and poor prices for farm products, especially within the local markets.

loans.use: to construct a zero-grazing unit and buy poultry birds.

loans.name: Miriam Migdalia

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Tosagua cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal Amistad, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Miriam, tiene 41 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos ambos mayores de edad,  uno de ellos aun vive con ella. Su esposo es empleado privado.

Nuestra amiga es una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto poder ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta joyas de de plata de Vizón, ropa interior de leonisa y productos de Esika (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja todos los días ya que también prepara almuerzos para entregar, en cuanto a sus productos ella realiza recorridos puerta a puerta, deja a crédito y que cobra cada ocho días. Tiene 9 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien, lo que es plata y vizon los compra en una distribuidora en Chone.

Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos, joyas de plata y ropa interior. Lleva 8 años  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los pagos son fáciles de hacer.

Su sueño es tener una boutique.
texts.en:
The “Amistad” (Friendship) communal bank meets every fifteen days in the city of Tosagua, a place known for being very dynamic where most of its residents raise animals and are farmers because it’s an area with much vegetation.

Miriam is 41 years old, married, and has two adult sons, one of whom still lives with her. Her husband is employed in the private sector. 

Miriam is a housewife who to obtain her own income and thus help her husband with the household expenses, has been selling "Vizón" silver jewellery, "Leonisa" lingerie, and "Esika" products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and ladies accessories). She works every day preparing meals for delivery. She sells beauty products door-to-door on credit and collects every eight days. She has been doing this for nine years and is doing quite well. She buys her silver and "Vizón" jewellery from a distributor in Chone.

The loan will be used to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, silver jewellery, and lingerie. She has been with the communal bank for eight years and she likes it because the payments are easy to make.

Her dream is to have a boutique.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, silver jewellery, and lingerie.

loans.name: Úrsula Paz

texts.es: Úrsula Paz, no logro terminar sus estudios básicos, pero la necesidad la hizo aprender a cultivar la tierra. Desde hace tres años cultiva maíz y frijoles junto a su esposo. A sus 35 años, tiene dos hijos, los dos viven con ella y su esposo. Además de los cultivos, su esposo aprendió el oficio de albañilería, en ocasiones realiza trabajos del cual logra sacar otros ingresos para complementar los gastos de las necesidades básicas de su hogar. Úrsula es una mujer increíble ya que trabaja muy duro para llevar el sustento a su hogar. La siembra la realiza cada año y luego de sacar la cosecha pone a la venta una parte de esta, en los mercados de la zona donde vive. Con el fin de comenzar la siembra de los granos básicos, solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar los insumos agrícolas necesarios como: semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc. Dado que es fundamental para cubrir las necesidades básicas como de educación, alimentación y vestuario de su familia.
texts.en: Úrsula Paz was not able to complete her basic education, but necessity made her learn to cultivate the earth.  For the past three years she and her husband have been raising corn and beans.  At 35 years of age, she has two children, both of whom live with her and her husband.  Besides the crops, her husband learned to work as a mason and at times does outside work that allows him to bring in other income to complement the basic household expenses.  Úrsula is an incredible woman and works very hard to maintain the household.  She raises the crops every year and sells part of the harvest in the markets in the zone where she lives.  She is asking for this loan through INTEGRAL so that she can buy the necessary farming supplies, such as seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, etc; given that it’s fundamental to cover the basic family necessities, such as education, food, and clothing.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies

loans.name: Roxana Arely

texts.es: Roxana Arely de veintidós años de edad vive junto a su madre y sus hermanos en casa propia; ella posee una venta de ropa en una zona muy concurrida de personas, vende en variedad faldas, camisas, vestidos, pantalones, todo para damas caballeros y niños, tiene muchos años con el negocio y tiene mucha clientela fija pues saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad a precios accesibles además de un buen servicio; Roxana es una mujer joven y emprendedora, muy visionaria, le gusta aprovechar todas las oportunidades que se le presentan , pues sabe que así podrá alcanzar el éxito, quiere ejercer una nueva inversión porque ha aumentado la demanda y no quiere decepcionar a los clientes por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor; Roxana Arely es responsable y con muy buenas referencias  de pago por eso tiene la certeza que cancelara el financiamiento con puntualidad, al mismo tiempo le ofrecerá a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Roxana Arely is 22 years old and lives with her mother and her siblings in their own house; she has a clothing shop in a very busy, popular region. She sells a variety of skirts, blouses, dresses, pants, everything for women, men and children. She has spent many years in this business and has many fixed clients.  They know that everything she sells is of the highest quality and at affordable prices. Furthermore, good service is provided.

Roxana is a young, enterprising woman and is very visionary. She likes to take advantage of all of the opportunities that are presented to her, since she knows that in this manner she will achieve success. She wants to make a new investment because demand has increased and she doesn't want to disappoint her clients.

So, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy wholesale clothing. Roxana Arely is responsible and has many good payment references. Due to this, there is certainty that she will pay back the funding punctually. At the same time, she will bring her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy various types of wood wholesale, nails, paint, varnish.

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es: María del Carmen tiene 45 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad con sus dos hijos de 24 y 17 años, uno se encuentra estudiando y el otro trabaja. Ella se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace 5 años. Dicho negocio está ubicado en su hogar de habitación en el cual cuenta con un espacio adecuado para la colocación de sus productos de manera atractiva para los clientes. Dado a que es una mujer muy responsable, trabajadora y carismática muchas personas la prefieren y cada día son más los clientes que demandan sus productos.  Con esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener su tiendita la cual es su principal fuente de ingresos. Su mayor sueño es poder dar  a sus hijos una calidad de vida diferente a la que ella ha tenido, esta es la razón por la cual trabaja duramente para lograr su sueño y poder mejorar la situación en la que actualmente se encuentra. Ha estado pensando mucho en la forma de hacer crecer su negocio y ha llegado a la conclusión, de que sería de mucho provecho,  surtir su tienda de tal forma que pueda cubrir una mayor demanda. Por lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de productos de tienda al por mayor tales como: aceite, galletas, huevos, arroz, frijoles,  jabón, aceite, y además  desea iniciar negocio con ropa, quiere invertir en variedad de prendas de vestir como: pantalones, faldas, blusas, etc. Para que su negocio sea más atractivo y pueda atraer a nuevos clientes. Confía en Dios y en su trabajo que de esta forma logrará sacar adelante a su familia y podrá mejora la calidad de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maria del Carmen, 45, lives in the home she owns with her two children ages 24 and 17. One is in school and the other works. She has been running a store for 5 years, located in her home where she has enough space to display her products in an attractive manner. Because she is responsible, hardworking and charismatic, many customers prefer her and every day demand for her products increases. With hard work and dedication she has been able to maintain her store, which is her main source of income. Her biggest dream is to be able to give her children a different quality of life than she has had. For that reason she works hard to achieve her dream and improve their situation. 

She has thought a lot about how to grow her business and has decided that it would be profitable to stock her store so that she can cover greater demand. For that reason she has decided to ask for a loan for INTEGRAL to buy products at wholesale like oil, cookies, eggs, rice, beans, soap, oil and also to begin selling clothing. She wants to buy a variety of garments like pants, skirts, blouses, etc so that her store is more attractive and will bring in new customers. She trusts in God and in her work that through this she will be able to get her family ahead and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy oil, cookies, eggs, rice, beans, soap, oil and a variety of garments like pants, skirts, blouses, etc.

loans.name: Clemente

texts.es: Clemente tiene 54 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hijo, el cual no pudo terminar sus estudios y ahora realiza algunos trabajos eventuales con lo que colabora con la economía del hogar. Ha trabajado toda su vida para ganarse el pan de cada día. Desde hace muchos años comenzó con el negocio de venta de ajos indios y chinos, al por mayor. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en los alrededores de la zona donde habita. Es muy conocido y respetado por sus vecinos y clientes ya que es un hombre trabajador, responsable y respetuoso. Ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchos clientes. Cabe mencionar que este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos y es lo que le ha permitido llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Con el fin de asegurar su negocio a decidido acercarse a esta institución para solicitar este crédito y poder invertir en la compra de ajos al por mayor, para darle un impulso al negocio y continuar percibiendo los ingresos que le permitan llevar el sustento a su hogar. Tiene mucha confianza que con la ayuda que le brinde esta institución logrará hacer la inversión que desea, y además expresa estar muy agradecido con esta institución ya que en el pasado le brindó la ayuda que solicito para invertir en su negocio.
texts.en:
Clemente is 54-years-old living in his own house with his son who was unable to complete his schooling so now works occasionally and is able to contribute to household’s economy.

He has worked his entire life to earn his daily bread.  Many years ago he started out with a business selling Indian and Chinese garlic at wholesale.  He sells from place to place in areas around where he lives.  He’s very well-known and respected by his neighbors and customers because he’s a hardworking, responsible and respectful man.

He’s succeeded in winning over the trust of many customers and it’s worth mentioning that this business is his main source of income and what’s made it possible for him to bring daily bread home.  

With the goal of securing his business, he decided to approach the institution to request this loan and to be able to buy garlic at wholesale to give the business a push and to continue earning income that will make it possible for him to bring sustenance home.

He trusts that with the help the institution may give him he will be able to make the investment he wants to and in addition he states that he’s very grateful to the institution because in the past it gave him the help he asked for to invest in his business.

loans.use: To purchase more garlic for resale

location.town: Lourdes Colón, departamento de La Libertad

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine has been working in mixed farming in her rural home area in Murang’a, Central Kenya for ten years.  Her farm produces tea and coffee that she sells to the Kenya Tea and Development Authority as well as the Coffee Board of Kenya, respectively. Christine's farm also produces cattle that she sells to the local butchers.

Christine has requested a loan of 60,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy more cattle to breed and later sell to local butchers. She hopes that improving the breeding of cattle will produce better returns in the future and pay for the education of her two children, ages sixteen and ten.

Christine identifies drought as the major challenge in farming, especially with dairy farming. She is glad Juhudi Kilimo is providing financing to farmers in her area and helping them improve their family living standard.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Adrian

texts.es: Adrian, a sus 50 años de edad, continua realizando el trabajo que desde muy pequeño aprendió junto a sus padres. Él se dedica a la agricultura, todos los años cultiva maíz y sorgo. Además, también se dedica a la compra y venta de cerdos. Es un un hombre emprendedor el cual junto a su esposa buscan la forma de mejorar su situación económica.  A pesar de su avanzada edad, tiene muchas aspiraciones de continuar trabajando para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su esposa. Debido a que la temporada para la siembra del maíz ya comenzó, necesita ponerse al día con los insumos agrícolas que le permitan comenzar con pie derecho este año y poder cultivar una buena cosecha. A tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución para que le den una ayudadita con un préstamo, para la obtención de: la semilla de maíz, fertilizantes, venenos para las plagas y pago de mano de obra. Una vez sacada la cosecha la pondrá a la venta en los mercados de la zona donde el habita. De esta forma espera lograr percibir  los ingresos necesarios para pagar el credito y llevar el sustento a su hogar.
texts.en:
Adrian, at 50 years old, has continued carrying out the business that he learned from his parents when he was young.  He works in agriculture, every year farming corn and sorghum.  Furthermore, he also works in the buying and selling of pigs.  He is an enterprising man who, along with his wife, looks for a way to improve his economic situation. Despite his advanced age, he has many aspirations to continue working to improve his quality of life and that of his wife.  Since the season of planting corn already started, he needs to get up to date with the agricultural inputs that allow him to get off on the right foot this year and be able to cultivate a good harvest.

He has made the decision to approach this institution so they will give him a little bit of help with a loan to obtain corn seeds, fertilizers, poison for pests and payment for the workforce. Once harvested, he will put the harvest out for sale in the markets in the region he lives in. In this way he  hopes to be able to receive the necessary income to pay the loan and bring sustenance to his home.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, fertilizers, poison for pests, etc.

loans.name: Alimatu

texts.en:
Alimatu is 55 years old.  She is married and has 6 children, ages 28, 25, 22, 20, 17 and 14. She has 3 additional dependents that help her with her business. In 2002, Alimatu established her foodstuff business. Alimatu uses the income she earns from her business to provide for the basic needs of her family. 

Alimatu has a very good loan repayment history. She now needs a loan of 4,000,000 SLL to help her buy bags of groundnut, onions and dry pepper. Alimatu hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 300,000.  In the future, Alimatu plans to rebuild her family house which was burnt down by fire. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy bags of groundnut, onions and dry pepper.

loans.name: Arco Iris  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Arco Iris está formado por 11 socias y 1 socio quienes viven por el Sector de 3 Marías en la parroquia de Turi en Cuenca, conocida también como El Mirador de la ciudad ya que desde allí se puede admirar gran parte de la ciudad de Cuenca, su gente es muy trabajadoras y se dedica a la cría de animales, agricultura y comercio. Nuestras socias son mujeres dedicadas a sus hogares y sus trabajos los mismos que les dan la oportunidad de mantener su dependencia económica y con sus sacrificios sacar adelante a sus familias.  Son mujeres de un gran corazón, amables y gentiles que aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus padres.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Perla, tiene 31 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 12 y 8 años de edad. Su esposo es profesor, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

La Señora. Perla es comerciante, se dedica a la venta de sandalias y bisutería, vende solo los días de feria, y el resto de su tempo lo dedica a sus hijos.
 
Este es el primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal ya que anterior mente era socia en otro grupo. Su crédito lo va a invertir compra de sandalias y bisutería para aumentar sus productos.
  
Su meta es de seguir creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
The “Arco Iris” (Rainbow) communal bank is formed by 12 people: 11 women and one man who live in Turi Parish’s Tres Marías sector in Cuenca also known as “El Mirador de la Ciudad” because from there one can view most of the city of Cuenca.  Its residents are very hardworking and are in agriculture, commerce and animal husbandry.

Our members are women who are devoted to their homes and their work which offer them the opportunity to be economically independent and to move their families forward by means of their sacrifices.  They are women with heart; kind and polite who still preserve the culture and traditions of their parents.

One of the members of this group is Perla, 31.  She’s married and has two children who are 12 and 8 years of age.  Her husband’s a teacher and the house they live in is their property.

Perla is a merchant, she sells sandals and costume jewelry.  She sell only on market days and the rest of the time she dedicates to her children.

This is the first loan she’s taken out with the communal bank because she used to belong to a different group.  She will use it to buy sandals and costume jewelry to increase her stock.  Her goal is to continue growing in her business.

loans.use: to buy sandals and costume jewelry.

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es: Ana Cecilia de treinta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella se dedica a la agricultura, cultivo de maíz, maicillo, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este rubro y tiene la capacidad y los  conocimientos suficientes para asistir buenas siembras, es muy conocida en la zona, los clientes saben que siempre comercia productos de las mejores cosechas, todo con calidad, y a  buenos precios, Ana se caracteriza por ser muy servicial siempre está a la orden de los clientes; es una mujer emprendedora dispuesta a realizar todo lo que sea necesario para salir adelante, quiere alcanzar el éxito y no se dará por vencida, por eso en esta cosecha quiere producir más y necesita invertir en insumos, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, maicillo, fertilizantes, herbicidas, etc. Ana Cecilia tiene buenas referencias de pago, no posee hasta el momento ninguna mora, por eso está segura que podrá saldar el financiamiento con puntualidad, además posee el respaldo económico de su esposo, junto todo con lo que espera ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ana Cecilia, 35, lives with her life companion and their children.  She’s in agriculture; she grows corn and sorghum and has been in this line of work for several years; she has sufficient skills to produce good harvests.  She’s very well-known in the zone and her customers know that she always sells products from the best harvests; everything is of quality and at good prices.

Ana is noted for being very service oriented; she’s always there for her customers.  She’s an enterprising woman willing to do everything necessary to get ahead.  She wants to attain success and will not be defeated which is why she wants to produce more in this next harvest and why she needs to invest in supplies.

This is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn and sorghum seeds, fertilizer, herbicide, etc.  Ana Cecilia has good credit references and to date has had no late payments which is why she’s sure that she’ll be able to repay the loan punctually.  Besides, she has financial backing from her husband.  All of this is in hopes of offering her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Maria Leonor

texts.es: María Leonor de sesenta y cinco años de edad  vive junto a su hijo en casa propia, ella posee un comedor donde vende desayunos y almuerzos plátanos, huevos, frijoles, queso, pollo carne, arroz, ensalada entre otros que soliciten los paladares de sus clientes, todo lo que elabora es exquisito, por eso se ha hecho de mucha clientela, además la prefieren porque saben que todo está realizado con material de primera calidad, higiénico y lo vende a precios accesibles. María se caracteriza por su enorme amabilidad; es una mujer trabajadora, muy entregada a su hogar y a su labor, tiene un excelente don en la cocina y lo está aprovechando al máximo, cada día aumenta la demanda porque los clientes están satisfechos, en consecuencia quiere aumentar la producción de comida y dado que no posee del suficiente capital para hacerlo solicita a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar carnes, granos básicos, condimentos, verduras, bebidas, etc. María Leonor tiene buenas referencias crediticias por eso asegura que se responsabilizara a pagar todo el financiamiento y al mismo tiempo hará lo posible para que su familia tenga una vida plena.
texts.en:
María Leonor is 65 years old. She lives with her son in her own home. She has a dining area where she sells breakfast and lunch, bananas, eggs, beans, cheese, chicken, rice, salad and other dishes that her clients like, all of them exquisitely made, which is why she has many customers. They prefer her place because they know that everything is made with the best products, and it’s clean, and she has affordable prices.

María is known for her enormous kindness. She is a working woman devoted to her house and her work. She has an excellent gift for the kitchen and she is taking full advantage of it. Each day the demand increases because the customers are satisfied, and therefore she wants to expand the production of food and because she does not have sufficient cash to do it she is asking Integral for a loan that will permit her to buy meat, basic grains, spices, vegetables, soft drinks, etc. María Leonor has good credit references and because of this is sure she will make her payments and at the same time it will make it possible for her family to have a fulfilling life.

loans.use: to buy meat, basic grains, spices, vegetables, and soft drinks

loans.name: Dora Maritza

texts.es: Dora Maritza de cuarenta años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia, ella posee un taller de costura donde confecciona todo tipo de prendas al gusto del cliente camisas, vestidos, faldas, pantalones de vestir entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio por lo que se ha hecho de valiosa experiencia, tiene mucha clientela, todos los que la visitan quedan satisfechos con su trabajo, pues es de calidad y a buen precio y sobre todo con un excelente servicio; Dora es una mujer activa muy trabajadora, cada día se levanta con la expectativa de buscar nuevas oportunidades que le ayuden a crecer en el negocio, para si en un futuro alcanzar el más grande éxito, últimamente tiene mucha demanda en el negocio , tiene clientes que desean camisas al mayoreo y necesita invertir para producir por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela, cajas de hilos, agujas, botones, etc. Dora Maritza tiene muy buenas referencia de créditos anteriores, por eso tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar la deuda, y así al mismo tiempo podrá ofrecerle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Dora Maritza, 40 years old, lives with her life partner and their children in their own house. She has a sewing workshop where she makes all types of garments to the client's specifications, like blouses, dresses, skirts and dress pants, among others.  She has spent several years in this business, which has given her valuable experience. She has many clients; everyone that visits her is left satisfied with her work since it is of high quality and at a good price and above all comes with excellent service.

Dora is an active, hard-working woman.
