Every day she gets up with the expectation of looking for new opportunities that will help her to grow her business so in her future she will achieve the greatest success. Lately she has had high demand in the business. She has clients that want shirts in bulk and she needs to invest to produce. Because of this, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy fabrics, boxes of threads, needles, buttons, etc.  Dora Martiza has many great references from previous loans. Due to this, there is certainty that she will pay back the debt, and at the same time she will be able to offer her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy fabric, boxes of threads, needles and buttons

loans.name: Clara Luz

texts.es:
La Señora. Clara es socia del banco comunal Nuevos Horizontes, vive por el centro de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad se caracteriza por la belleza de su centro Histórico que es una mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, lo que le dio el nombre de Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad en Diciembre de 1999, su variedad en la gastronomía cautiva el paladar de propios y extraños, su gente es amable, gentil y de un corazón cálido.

Doña Clara tiene 70 años de edad, es madre soltera de 3 hijas quienes son todas casadas, 2 de ellas viven independientes y una vive en su casa compartiendo los gastos del hogar, no tienen casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
La Señora. Clara es comerciante desde hace 35 años, vende ropa y productos de bazar recorriendo la ciudad, para comprar su mercadería viaja a diferentes lugares del país. También para mejorar sus ingresos por las noches vende chuzos (carne en palito), hace 2 años realiza esta actividad y trabaja de domingo a domingo.

Hace 13 años es socia del banco comunal y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de ropa y artículos de bazar para tener una mayor variedad en su negocio.

Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Clara is a member of the “Nuevos Horizontes” (New Horizons) communal bank.  She lives in downtown Cuenca, a city noted for the beauty of its historic city center which blends the colonial with the modern and which led to it’s being designated a Cultural Heritage of Humanity in December, 1999.  Its varied cuisine enchants the palates of locals and foreigners alike and its residents are kind, polite, warmhearted people.

Clara is 70-years-old and the single mother of three daughters who are all married.  Two of them live independently and one lives with her sharing household expenses.  They do not own their house, they rent.

Clara has been a merchant for 35 years.  She sells clothes and house wares throughout the city.  To buy merchandise she travels to various parts of the country.  In order to improve her income she also sells “chuzos”(skewered meat) at night.  She’s been doing this activity for two years and works Sunday to Sunday.

She’s been a member of the communal bank for 13 years and will use the new loan to buy clothes and house wares to have a wider variety in her business.  Her dream is to own a house.

loans.use: to buy clothes and housewares.

loans.name: Arlindo

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 4 filhos 2 destes frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém. 	
Trabalha como segurança na empresa G4S e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (carnes, arroz, farinha, sabão, óleo, feijão e outros) para aumentar e diversificar o seu produto. 
No futuro pretende melhorar ainda mais o seu negócio para aumentar a renda da família e oferecer melhores condições de vida a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é falta de outros produtos localmente, assim muitas vezes é obrigado a viajar para o fora do país para a sua aquisição.
texts.en:
Arlindo is married and is the father of four children, two of whom are in school.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  He works as a security guard at the company G4S, and his current loan will be used to buy products (meat, rice, flour, soap, butter, beans, etc.) to increase and diversify his inventory.

In the future, he hopes to improve his business even more to increase his family's income and to offer them better living conditions.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is the lack of certain products locally, so often he is obligated to travel out of the country to acquire them.

loans.use: to buy and sell various products.

loans.name: Milton Humberto

texts.es: Milton Humberto de veintinueve años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, se dedica a la agricultura desde los dieciocho años tiene ya varios años de experiencia que le han ayudado obtener buenas cosechas, comercia en todos los alrededores de la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela fija, pues saben que todo lo que vende es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Milton es un hombre emprendedor dispuesto a salir adelante y triunfar en un futuro, desea que su negocio crezca por eso quiere hacer una inversión en insumos  grande pero necesita de capital, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz y frijol, fertilizantes insecticidas, herramientas etc. Milton Humberto tiene buenas referencias de pago  y es muy responsable sabe que sus ganancias le permitirán pagar la deuda y al mismo tiempo podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Milton Humberto, 29, lives with his life companion and their children.  He grows corn and beans.  He’s worked in agriculture since the age of 18 and has several years’ experience that have helped him produce good harvests.  He sells in all the areas around his zone and has acquired a large number of regular customers because they know that everything he sells is of very good quality and at affordable prices; besides service is excellent.

Milton is an enterprising man determined to get ahead and succeed in the future.  He wants his business to grow so he wants to make a large investment in supplies but needs capital which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will make it possible for him to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, tools, etc.

Milton Humberto has good credit references and is very responsible; he knows that his profits will make it possible for him to repay the loan while at the same time being able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, farm supplies and tools.

loans.name: Libia Mercedes

texts.es:
La Señora. Libia es socia del banco comunal Nuevos Horizontes, vive por el centro de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad se caracteriza por la belleza de su centro Histórico que es una mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, lo que le dio el nombre de Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad en Diciembre de 1999, su variedad en la gastronomía cautiva el paladar de propios y extraños, su gente es amable, gentil y de un corazón cálido.

La Señora. Libia tiene 63 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos de los que 4 están casados y viven independientes, una hija soltera trabaja y le ayuda económicamente. Su esposo labora en un taller de latonería (enderezar latas de vehículos), no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando. 

Doña Libia es comerciante, se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de ropa y de varios artículos para el hogar y de bazar, actividad que la desempeña hace 10 años, su mercadería la compra en diferentes lugares del país.

Se encuentra hace 14 años en el banco comunal y es socia fundadora del grupo, su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de artículos de bazar, ropa y artículos para el hogar.
 
Su sueño es de seguir conservando su salud y  crecer en el trabajo.
texts.en:
Libia is a member of the communal bank Nuevos Horizontes. She lives in the center of the city of Cuenca. This city is known for its beautiful historic center which is a mixture between colonial and modern and was given the status of World Heritage Trust site in December 1999. Its variety of cuisine captivates the palates of locals and foreigners, its people are friendly, gentle and have a warm heart.

Libia is 63 years old, married and has five children of which four are married and living independently, and one working daughter who helps them financially. Her husband works at an auto body shop (straightening the bodies of vehicles). She does not have her own house but rents.

Libia is a merchant selling all types of clothing and various household and bazaar articles. She has been doing this for ten years, buying her merchandise in different parts of the country.

She has been a member of the communal bank for fourteen years and is a founding member of the group. Her loan will be used to invest in the purchase of bazaar articles, clothing and household goods.

Her dream is to continue to have good health and for her business to grow.

loans.use: to buy bazaar articles, clothing, and household goods

loans.name: María Nieves

texts.es:
La Señora. María es socia del banco comunal Nuevos Horizontes, vive por el centro de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad se caracteriza por la belleza de su centro Histórico que es una mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, lo que le dio el nombre de Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad en Diciembre de 1999, su variedad en la gastronomía cautiva el paladar de propios y extraños, su gente es amable, gentil y de un corazón cálido.

La Señora María tiene 48 años, es divorciada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 7 hijos, cuatro de ellos son casados y viven independientes, uno de sus hijos trabaja y le ayuda economícamente, un hijo estudia en el colegio y su ultimo hijo estudia en una escuelita de la ciudad. La casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

Doña María sufre de gastritis por lo que pasa en un constante tratamiento pero todos los miembros de su familia están gozando de muy buena salud.
 
Nuestra socia se dedica a la cría de animales y a la agricultura esta actividad la desempeña desde que era muy joven siguiendo el ejemplo de sus padres y ahora le permite solventar los gastos de su hogar.

El dinero de su crédito anterior lo invirtió comprando abono pero debido al invierno se le daño su cosecha por lo que se atraso un poco en el pago de sus cuotas pero ya realizo la cancelación total. Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cerdos, cuyes, semillas y abono para sus cultivos. La banca comunal le gusta porque son un grupo unido y solidario quienes se apoyan mutuamente para salir  adelante. 

Su meta es continuar creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
María is a member of the “Nuevos Horizontes” (New Horizons) communal bank.  She lives in downtown Cuenca, a city noted for the beauty of its historic city center which blends the colonial with the modern and which led to it’s being designated a Cultural Heritage of Humanity in December, 1999.  Its varied cuisine enchants the palates of locals and foreigners alike and its residents are kind, polite, warmhearted people.

María is 48-years-old, divorced and the mother of seven children.  Four of them are already married and live on their own, one of her sons works and helps her economically, one son attends secondary school and her youngest attends a little school in the city.  The house she lives in is hers.

María has gastritis so she’s in constant treatment but all the other members of her family enjoy very good health.

Our member works raising animals and in agriculture, an activity she’s been doing since she was very young following her parents’ example and now it the source of income to cover her household expenses.
 
She used the money from her previous loan to buy manure but her harvest was damaged by the winter and she fell behind a little with her payments but she’s now repaid it totally.  She will use her new loan to buy pigs, guinea-pigs, seeds and manure for her crops.  

She likes the communal bank because they are a united, mutually supportive group that support each other in order to get ahead.  Her goal is to continue growing in her business.

loans.use: to buy pigs, guinea-pigs, seeds and manure.

loans.name: Albertina

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 3 filhos que frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 2 netos que vivem com ela. 	
Comerciante e dona do seu próprio negócio, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (ferro, chapas de zinco, cantoneiras, estribos e outros) para dar continuidade com a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro pretende construir um estabelecimento comercial para venda de produtos alimentares, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é adquirir um terreno para realizar actividade Agrícola, como forma de melhorar a dieta alimentar e subir a renda familiar.
texts.en:
Albertina is a single mother of three children who go to school.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports two grandchildren who live with her.  She owns her own business.  Her current loan will be used to buy construction materials (iron, metal sheets, shelves, steps, etc.) to continue work on her home.

In the future, she hopes to build a retail establishment ot sell food products, for which she promises to make her payments on time so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.

He challenge is to acquire land to do agricultural work as a way to improve her family's diet and increase their income.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (iron, zinc sheets, shelves, steps, etc).

loans.name: Alis Gioconda

texts.es:
La Señora. Alis es socia del banco comunal Renacer Uncovia, vive por los alrededores de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por su belleza arquitectónica la misma que le da el nombre de Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, cuenta con varios lugares para visitar y la belleza de la naturaleza, tiene una gran variedad en la gastronomía la que cautiva a propios y visitantes, su gente es amable, gentil, aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora. Alis tiene 38 años de edad, vive en unión libre y ha concebido 2 hijos de 17 y 13 años de edad que estudian en un colegio de la ciudad, también está muy contenta ya que se encuentra embaraza de 3 meses. Su esposo es de profesión árbitro, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
Doña Alis es oriunda de la provincia de Esmeraldas y hace algunos años se ha venido a la Ciudad de Cuenca a vivir por un familiar, ahora en la ciudad se dedica a la venta de comida, tiene un puesto propio en el cual vente desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 2 de la tarde y trabaja de domingo a domingo.
 
Se encuentra en el tercer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir  para comprar víveres para la preparación de sus platos.

 Su sueño es tener casa propia.
texts.en:
Alis is a member of the “Renacer Uncovia” communal bank.  She lives in Cuenca’s outskirts, a city noted for the beauty of its historic city center which blends the colonial with the modern and which led to it’s being designated a Cultural Heritage of Humanity in December, 1999.  Its varied cuisine enchants the palates of locals and foreigners alike and its residents are kind, polite, warmhearted people.

Alis is 38 years old and is in a common law relationship.  She has two children who are 17 and 13 years old attending a secondary school in the city.  She’s also happy because she is three months’ pregnant.  Her husband works as a referee.  She does not own her house, she’s a renter.

Alis is from Esmeraldas Province originally and a few years ago she moved to the city of Cuenca to live by a relative and now that she’s in the city she works selling food.  She has her own stand where she sells from 7 in the morning until 2 in the afternoon; she works Sunday to Sunday.

This is the third loan she’s taken in the communal bank and the new reason is to buy foodstuffs used in her meal preparation.  Her dream is to own a house.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs.

loans.name: Rosa María

texts.es:
La Señora. Rosa es socia del banco comunal Renacer Uncovia, vive por los alrededores de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es reconocida por su belleza arquitectónica la misma que le da el nombre de Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, cuenta con varios lugares para visitar y la belleza de la naturaleza, tiene una gran variedad en la gastronomía la que cautiva a propios y visitantes, su gente es amable, gentil, aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Rosa tiene 61 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 8 hijos, 7 de ellos son casados y viven independientes, su hija soltera trabaja y le ayuda económicamente. Su esposo se dedica al comercio, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
 
La Señora Rosa es oriunda de la provincia de Esmeraldas, llego a la ciudad porque una de sus hijas le invito y a le gusto mucho la ciudad, ella se dedica a la venta de comida ambulantemente, actividad que la desempeña hace 10 años y labora de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo.
 
Este es el sexto ciclo que realiza en el banco comunal y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una refrigeradora que le hace falta para su negocio.
 
Su sueño es tener una casa propia en la ciudad de Cuenca.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the “Renacer Uncovia” communal bank.  She lives in Cuenca’s outskirts, a city noted for the beauty of its historic city center which blends the colonial with the modern and which led to it’s being designated a Cultural Heritage of Humanity in December, 1999.  Its varied cuisine enchants the palates of locals and foreigners alike and its residents are kind, polite, warmhearted people.

Rosa is 61-years-old, married and has 8 children.  Seven of them are married and live on their own.  Her daughter is single and helps out economically.  Her husband is a merchant.  They do not own a house; they rent.

Rosa is originally from Esmeraldas Province but came to the city because a daughter invited her and she liked the city very much.  She sells food from place to place, an activity she’s been in for ten years.  She works Sunday to Sunday with no fixed schedule.

This is the sixth loan she’s taken with the communal bank and will use this new loan to buy a refrigerator she needs very much for her business.  Her goal is to own a house in the city of Cuenca.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Andre

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta ninguém. 	
Trabalha numa pensão como servente e é agricultor dono de machamba, com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar insumos (sementes de couve, alface, cenoura, beterraba, repolho, e outro). 
No futuro pretende subir de cargo e melhorar o seu salário, e concluir a sua casa para melhor confortar a sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a actividade Agrícola, pois durante o inverno a produção baixa e com isso a renda familiar também baixa.
texts.en:
Andre is married and is the father of two children who go to school.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone besides them.  He works in a boarding home as an attendatn and also farms his own land.  With his current loan, he will buy supplies (kale, lettuce, carrot, beet, cabbage, and other seeds).

In the future, he wants to be promoted, improve his salary, and finish his home so his family is more comfortable.  To do this, he promises to make his payments on time so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is his agricultural work because during the winter his production decreases, so his family's income also decreases.

loans.use: to buy supplies (kale, lettuce, carrot, beet, cabbage, and other seeds).

loans.name: Sandra Guadalupe

texts.es: Sandra Guadalupe  de cuarenta años de edad vive junto a su hijo en casa propia, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, granos básicos, bebidas, embutidos, entre otros, además vende tortillas; el negocio está ubicado en el lugar de su residencia, es muy conocida en la zona por ser una buena comerciante y porque todo lo que vende y elabora es de calidad y a precios accesibles; Sandra es una mujer dedicada a su labor, siempre dispuesta a salir adelante quiere mantenerse al frente de su competencia y desea invertir en el negocio pero necesita de capital es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, pan, bebidas embutidos etc. Sandra Guadalupe tiene capacidad de pago y buenas referencias crediticias, es así como tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar el financiamiento con éxito y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una vida completa.
texts.en: Sandra Guadalupe is 40 years old and lives with her son in a home of her own.  She has a store where she sells primary needs products, such as basic grains, drinks, and sausages among other things.  She also sells tortillas.  This business is located in her home.  She is very well known in the zone because she’s a good merchant and because everything she makes is of good quality and good prices.  Sandra is a lady who is very dedicated to her job and always ready to get ahead.  She wants to stay at the forefront of her specialty and wants to invest in her business.  She needs working capital, so she is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL, which will allow her to buy basic grains, instant products, snacks, bread, drinks, sausages, etc.  Sandra Guadalupe is able to pay and comes with good references.  It’s because of this that it’s certain that she can repay her loan successfully and give her family a complete life at the same time..

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Teodoro

texts.es: Teodoro, habita solo en casa de su propiedad. Vive en condiciones muy humildes. No cuenta con los servicios básicos, excepto por el agua. Él se dedica al cultivo de la tierra desde hace muchos años. Cada año repite la misma actividad, de sembrar y luego recoger la cosecha la cual pone a la venta. Además de la agricultura también aprendió el oficio de albañilería, en ocasiones realiza trabajos que le permiten percibir otros ingresos para poder subsistir. Es un hombre emprendedor el cual también se dedica a la crianza de cerdos. Tiene muy buenas relaciones en la zona donde vive, ya que es un hombre responsable, laborioso y respetuoso. Ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas las cuales demandan los granos básicos una vez sale la cosecha. Vale la pena mencionar que en el pasado fue afectado por las lluvias, esto le generó problemas ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos y sin la cosecha no pudo sacar los ingresos necesarios para cubrir sus necesidades y responsabilidades. Solicita este crédito a esta institución esperando tener una respuesta favorable. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de los insumos agrícolas necesarios (semillas, abonos, insecticidas, etc.) Confía en Dios que logrará una cosecha abundante que le permitirá cancelar el crédito y llevar el sustento a su hogar
texts.en: Teodoro lives alone in his own home. He lives in humble conditions. He does not have the basic services, except for water. He has been working as a farmer for many years. Each year he repeats the same work, planting and later harvesting a crop which he sells. Besides agriculture he also learned masonry work, sometimes getting work that gives him an extra income in order to survive. He is an entrepreneur who also works breeding pigs. He has good relations in the area where he lives, as he is a responsible man, hard working, and respectful. He has earned the trust of many people who need basic grains at harvesting time. It is worth mentioning that in the past he was affected by the rains, which meant problems as he didn’t have another source of income without the harvest and could not get the necessary funds to cover his necessities and responsibilities. He is asking for a loan from the institution hoping to have a favorable response. The loan will be used for the purchase of necessary agricultural supplies (seeds, fertilizer, pest control, etc.). He trusts in God that he will have an abundant crop that will permit him to pay his loan and provide a livelihood.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and pest control

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa de Jesús de cuarenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hija; ella se dedica  la compra y venta de leña, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este negocio y le ha dado buenos resultados,  se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues lo que comercia es de calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable Teresa siempre está a la orden de las personas; es una mujer emprendedora un ejemplo a seguir, siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el éxito; últimamente ha aumentado la demanda en su negocio y quiere invertir en más compra de insumo por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar leña por mayor para así no decepcionar a los clientes; Teresa de Jesús responsable con buenas referencias crediticias tiene la seguridad que podrá saldar la deuda con éxito y al mismo tiempo podrá darle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en: Forty-six-year-old Teresa de Jesús lives with her life partner and daughter. She makes a living buying and selling firewood. She has been making a living doing this business for several years and it has given her good outcomes. She has made a lot of customers as what she sells is of quality and at accessible prices. Moreover, her service is incomparable. Teresa is always ready to serve people and is an entrepreneurial woman, an example to follow. She is always awaiting new opportunities that will allow her to reach success. Recently she has increased her business' demand and wants to invest in the purchase of more supplies. For this reason she is requesting a loan from Integral that will allow her to buy wholesale firewood and thus not disappoint her customers. Teresa de Jesús, responsible and with good credit references, has the security that she will be able to settle her debt with success and at the same time be able to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale firewood.

loans.name: Maritza Del Carmen

texts.es: Maritza del Carmen de treinta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella de dedica a la agricultura y ya tiene varios años de experiencia, cultiva especialmente maíz y frijol, en un terreno de cuatro manzanas cerca de donde vive, sus cosechas siempre son las mejores por eso tiene mucha clientela porque lo que comercia es de calidad y lo vende a precio accesible además el servicio es inigualable siempre trata bien a las personas; Maritza es una mujer dedicada a su labor, enérgica y con muchas ganas de cumplir sus sueños, uno de ellos es aumentar la producción en este periodo de siembra, para aumentar las ganancias pero necesita de capital porque las compras las hace al contado por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, herbicida, herramientas etc. Maritza del Carmen tiene buen record crediticio y excelentes referencias de pago, por eso tiene la certeza que cancelará el financiamiento en el tiempo establecido además sabe que podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maritza del Carmen, 36, lives with her life companion and children.  She has several years of experience in agriculture, planting corn and beans on four manzanas of land close to her home. Her harvests are always very good, so she has many customers for her quality, well-priced merchandise. Her service is also unequaled; she always treats people well.

Maritza is energetic, dedicated to her work, and very much wants to achieve her dreams. One of these is to increase production during this planting season so that she can increase her profits. She needs capital to do this because her purchases must be paid for in cash. Therefore, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL, with which she will buy corn seed, beans, fertilizer, weed killer, tools, etc. Maritza del Carmen has a good credit history and credit references and feels certain that she will make her payments on time. She also knows that she will be able to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, beans, fertilizer, weed killer, and tools.

loans.name: Celina Del Carmen

texts.es: Celina del Carmen vive junto a su hijo ella se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal, cremas, perfumes, cosméticos entre otros, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este negocio y lo realiza de forma ambulante o desde su casa, tiene mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que ella comercia es de muy buena calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; Celina una mujer creativa y muy trabajadora en  este mes dedicado a las madres se concentró elaborar pequeños arreglos con productos para la venta y le dieron muy buen resultado, aprovecho cada pedido y vendió todos sus productos; ahora ya aumento la demanda y no quiere decepcionar a los clientes ni perder oportunidad de hacer negocio, por eso quiere realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital,  por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cosméticos, perfumes, cremas, etc. Celina del Carmen sabe que es muy responsable y que tiene muy buenas referencias de pago por eso está segura que saldara el pago del financiamiento, al mismo tiempo promete para su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Celina del Carmen lives with her son and makes a living by selling personal products like creams, perfumes, cosmetics, and other items.  She has done this for several years and makes her sales as a street vendor or out of her home.  She has a large clientele because they know that everything she sells is high quality, and she sells it at reasonable prices.  Her service is also unequaled.  Celina is a creative and hard-working woman.  In this month that is dedicated to mothers, she focused on selling small arrangements with products, and her results were very good.  She made the most of every order and sold all of her products.  Now her demand has increased, and she doesn't want to let her customers down or lose the opportunity to do business.  This is why she wants to make a new investment, but she needs the capital.  This is why she is requesting a loan from Integral that will let her buy cosmetics, perfumes, creams, etc.  Celina del Carmen knows that she is very responsible and has very good references.  She is sure that she will make her payments on time.  At the same time, she promises her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, perfumes, and creams.

loans.name: Pedro Eduardo

texts.es: Pedro Eduardo tiene 28 años de edad, y habita junto a su familia. Él se dedica a la agricultura desde hace mucho tiempo. Desde muy temprano aprendió a sembrar la tierra y ahora es su principal fuente de ingresos. Todos los años repite la misma actividad de preparar la tierra, sembrar, sacar la cosecha y ponerla a la venta. Es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar y ayuda con los gastos de las principales necesidades básicas del hogar. Su deseo es poder mejorar su situación económica ya que vive en condiciones  muy sencillas y humildes junto a su familia. Todo esto lo motiva a comprometerse más en su trabajo ya que para él su familia lo es todo. Dado que depende de los ingresos de la agricultura, solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en los insumos agrícolas (semillas, abonos e insecticidas.) para comenzar la siembra  y además necesita pagar mano de obra  que le ayude en el inicio de dicha tarea. Confía en Dios que con su trabajo y la ayuda de esta institución logrará una cosecha abundante que le permitirá accesar a una mejor calidad de vida y continuar llevando el sustento a su hogar.
texts.en:
Pedro Eduardo is 28 and lives with his family. He has been farming for a long time. Very early on, he learned to plant the land, and now that is his main source of income. Every year he repeats the process of preparing the land, planting, harvesting, and selling the products. This is how he provides for his household and meets the expenses of his family's basic needs. 

He wants to improve his financial situation, as he and his family live in very simple, modest circumstances. This motivates him to commit himself even more to his work, because family is everything to him. Since his income depends on farming, he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase agricultural supplies (seeds, fertilizer, and insecticides) to start planting. He also needs to pay the laborers who will help him start the planting. He trusts God that, with his work and the support of this institution, he will have an abundant harvest that will allow him a better life as he continues to provide for his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and insecticides.

loans.name: María Leticia

texts.es: María Leticia de treinta y siete años de edad vive junto a sus padres y sus hijos, es una madre soltera emprendedora, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa interior para hombre y mujer, además ropa para niño, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues le surte a los comerciantes que venden al detalle y a los puestos de algunos mercados, todo lo que comercia es de calidad, a buenos precios y con un excelente servicio; María Leticia es una mujer admirable, le encanta su trabajo siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades y nuevas ideas para superarse y sobresalir, piensa que el más grande éxito solo lo gana el que no se rinde en la batalla, ahora que tiene mucha demanda desea invertir más y extender el negocio  pero necesita de un apoyo de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa interior, y ropa de niño por mayor; María Leticia tiene buenas referencias de pago, ya tiene experiencia crediticia, por eso se hace totalmente responsable del pago del financiamiento, y además tiene fe que así podrá darle a su familia una vida más completa.
texts.en: María Leticia, 31, lives with her parents and her children.  She is a single mother and businesswoman.  She has a business selling undergarments for men and women, and also children's clothing.  She has had this business for a number of years, and she has gained a large customer base.  She supplies merchandise to the merchants who sell at retail and from stalls in some of the markets.  Everything she sells is of good quality, and she sells at very good prices offering excellent service. María Leticia is an admirable woman.  She loves her work, as she is always on the lookout for new opportunities and new ideas so that she can improve and do well.  She believes that the greatest success comes to those who never give up the fight.  At this time, she has a lot of demand, and so she wants to invest more and expand the business.  However, she needs support with capital, and so for this reason she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL.  This loan will allow her to buy undergarments and children's clothing at wholesale.  María Leticia has good credit references, and a credit history, and she accepts the responsibility for making the payments on her loan.  Also, she has faith that in this way, she will be able to give her family a fuller life.

loans.use: to buy underwear, briefs, boxers, thongs and children's clothing at wholesale

loans.name: Luis Antonio

texts.es: Luis Antonio de 47 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa. Él se dedica al cultivo de cereales, principalmente maíz. Cada año siembra 5 manzanas de maíz, lo que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar. Es un hombre trabajador, responsable y muy dedicado en sus responsabilidades.  Gracias a su  buen desempeño en el trabajo, se ha ganado la confianza de sus vecinos los cuales expresan estar muy contentos con el servicio que el ofrece ya que cada año después de sacar la cosecha pone a la venta una parte de la misma. Vale la pena mencionar que él y su esposa dependen de los ingresos que obtienen de la agricultura por lo que es indispensable que cada año realice esta actividad. Solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de los insumos agrícolas como: abonos, semillas, insecticidas, etc. para dar inicio a la siembra de los cereales, ya que de esta forma podrá continuar llevando el sustento a su familia.
texts.en: Luis Antonio is 47 yeas old. He lives in his own house with his wife. He works cultivating grains, mainly corn. Each year he grows about 8-1/2 acres of corn which gives him a livelihood. He is a hard working man, trustworthy, and very dedicated to his responsibilities. Thanks to his good work performance, he has gained the trust of his neighbors who say they are very happy with the service he offers. Each year after harvesting he sells part of it. It is worth mentioning that he and his wife depend on the earnings they obtain from farming which is why it is essential that he does this work each year. He is asking for a loan from Integral in order to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer, seeds, pest control, etc., in order to begin planting the grains so that he can continue providing for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seed, and pest control

loans.name: Ismat

texts.ru: Исмат проживает в районе Шахритус. Ему 43 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Его жена работает в колхозе. Сам Исмат занимается животноводством. Он берет кредит для закупа крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Ismat lives in the Shahrituz Region. He is married, with three children. His wife works at a collective farm. Ismat raises livestock. He is taking out a loan in order to buy cattle.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Mamamurat

texts.ru: Мамамурат проживает в районе Шахритус. Ему 40 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Его жена работает в дехканском хозяйстве. Он сам занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. В этой области он 15 лет. Кредит берет для закупа селитры и карбамида.
texts.en: Mamurat lives in the Shahrituz Region. He is 40 years old. He is married, with four children. His wife works in an agricultural co-op. He grows produce. He has been in this business for 15 years. He is taking out a loan to buy saltpeter and carbamide.

loans.use: to buy saltpeter and carbamide.

loans.name: Sebastiana

texts.es:
La señora Sebastiana esta casad, tiene 42 años de edad, cursó solamente 1 años en educación primaria, tiene 3 hijos , se dedica a la artesanía al tejido de cortes típicos, inicio este negocio juntamente con su esposo y hasta el momento lleva 26 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilos de diferente colores, y mejorar su produccion, espera en el futuro tener un negocio bien capitalizado.
texts.en:
Sebastiana is married. She is 42 years old and has only a 1st grade education. She has three children, and she works in crafts, weaving typical lengths of material. She started this business with her husband and has 26 years of experience so far.
She is requesting a loan which she will use to purchase different color threads and to improve production. She hopes to have a well capitalized business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase thread for weaving.

loans.name: Tempo

texts.es: Tempo de 46 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su numeroso grupo familiar, el cual está integrado por sus 6 hijos y su esposa. Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo desde hace muchos años. Debido a que no conto con la oportunidad de estudiar sus padres le enseñaron a ganarse la vida honradamente por medio del cultivo de la tierra. Sabe mucho de agricultura, dado que tiene mucha experiencia cultivando la tierra. Él y  su familia dependen de los ingresos que genera la cosecha, por lo que es muy importante comenzar la siembra lo antes posible ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos que le permita llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Esta es la razón por la cual solicita este préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en los insumos agrícolas (insecticidas, semillas, fertilizantes, etc.) que son indispensables para obtener una cosecha favorable. No pierde las esperanzas que con esta ayuda logrará obtener muy buenos resultados y podrá cancelar este crédito y continuar llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
Tempo, 46, lives in his own house with his large family, which comprises his 6 children and his wife. For many years, he has cultivated corn and sorghum. Since he didn't have the opportunity to go to school, his parents taught him to earn a living honorably by cultivating the land. He knows a lot about farming, given his long experience cultivating the land.

He and his family depend on the income from the harvest. Therefore, he must start planting as soon as possible because he doesn't have another source of income that will allow him to support his family. For this reason, he is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL to purchase agricultural supplies (insecticides, seeds, fertilizer, etc.) that are critical for a favorable harvest. He won't lose hope that with this support, he will achieve better results and be able to pay the loan and continue providing for his family.

loans.use: to buy insecticides, seeds, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Celia Guadalupe

texts.es: Celia Guadalupe de veintitrés años de edad vive junto a su madre en casa propia; ella posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad arroz, frijoles, pan, jabones, entre otros, el negocio está ubicado en el lugar de su residencia, su clientela la conforma la gente que vive a los alrededores, todos la prefieren porque es la tienda más surtida y ahí encuentran todo lo que necesitan a precios accesibles y con productos de calidad además Celia se caracteriza por ser  muy servicial siempre recibe a las personas muy contenta; es una mujer joven entusiasta de salir adelante y triunfar, le gusta aprovechar cada oportunidad que se le presenta, quiere mantener su negocio adelante de la competencia, pero tiene que invertir más en productos y necesita  de liquidez porque todas las compras las hace al contado por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, pan, golosinas, bebidas, huevos etc. Celia Guadalupe tiene buenas referencias y ahorita no posee ningún otro crédito, por eso se hace responsable de cancelar con puntualidad el financiamiento, y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Celia Guadalupe, 23, lives with her mother in her own house.  She has a store where she sells basic household goods: rice, beans, bread, and soap, among other things.  The business is located in her residence.  Her customers are the people who live nearby.  Everyone prefers her because it is the best-stocked store and they find everything they need there, of a high quality and at affordable prices.  In addition, Celia is very helpful and always welcomes people very contentedly. 

She is a young woman who is enthusiastic about getting ahead and being successful.  She likes to make the most of every opportunity that comes up.  She wants to keep her business ahead of the competition, but she has to invest more on products and she needs a cash flow because she makes all her purchases in cash.  This is why she is requesting a loan from Integral that will allow her to buy staple items, instant food products, bread, candy, beverages, eggs, etc.

Celia Guadalupe has good references and has no other loan right now, so she can assume responsibility for making her payments on time and, at the same time, give her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy staples, instant food products, bread, candy, beverages, and eggs.

loans.name: Dinora

texts.es: Dinora, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo y  sus 4 hijos de 15, 13, 11 y 6 años, los cuales se encuentran estudiando. Junto con su esposo trabajan duramente para sacar adelante a sus hijos y poder dar el pan de cada día. Su sueño es verlos convertidos como todos unos profesionales con mejores condiciones de vida a la que ellos han tenido. Ella se dedica, tanto a las tareas del hogar como a las tareas de la agricultura, junto a su esposo. Cada año cultivan la tierra en la cual siembran maíz y frijoles. Después de sacar la cosecha, destinan una parte para la venta, ya que necesitan cubrir otras necesidades básicas de su hogar. Debido a que su familia es un poco grande, las exigencias son mayores y sus hijos tienen más necesidades tanto de educación como de alimentación y vestuario, las cuales hay que ir satisfaciendo. Solicita este credito a INTEGRAL para que le ayude a cubrir los gastos en la adquisición de los insumos agrícolas necesarios (abonos, semillas, insecticidas, etc.) para comenzar la siembra de los cultivos  correspondientes  a este año. De esta  forma espera poder  mejorar las condiciones económicas de su familia. Confía que después de sacar la cosecha podrá cancelar dicho crédito y podrá continuar llevando el sustento a su hogar.
texts.en: Dinora lives in her own house with her husband and their 4 children, aged 15, 13, 11 and 6, who all attend school.  Dinora and her husband work hard together to get ahead with their children and provide for their daily needs.  Dinora's dream is to see her children become professionals with better living conditions than they have had.  Dinora spends her time doing housework and working with her husband in the fields.  They each cultivate land where they plant corn and beans.  After the harvest, some of their crops are sold because they need to cover other basic needs for the home.  Because her family is fairly large, the requirements are greater.  Their children have a lot of needs, in terms of their education as well as food and clothing, that they have to satisfy.  Dinora is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL to help cover the expenses related to the purchase of some necessary agricultural supplies (fertilizer, seeds, insecticides, etc) so that she can start this year's plantings.  In this way, she hopes to improve the financial situation of her family.  She says that after the harvest, she will be able to pay off this loan and continue to support her household.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Santos Cristina

texts.es: Santos Cristina de treinta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos a pocos kilometros de distancia de la capital del país en uno de los populosos municipios del país,  ella se dedica a la compra y venta de cartón, plásticos y material reciclable, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este negocio y le ha dado muy buenos resultados el mes pasado obtuvo muy buenas ganancias, compra material por diferentes zonas aledañas a donde reside y tiene varios compradores y vendedores siempre a su disposición pues saben que es una persona honrada y trabajadora; su trabajo es su mayor tesoro pues es con el que sostiene su hogar siempre está luchando por conseguir cumplir sus sueños, piensa que no hay que temer al futuro si no  enfrentar al futuro para que esté lleno de éxitos, necesita aumenta su inversión y no le alcanza por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que permita comprar cartón, plásticos, botellas etc. Santos Cristina tiene la capacidad crediticia que se necesita para poder pagar el financiamiento además tiene buenas referencias y una excelente responsabilidad; espera de esta forma poder darle a su  familia una vida más completa como se la merecen.
texts.en:
Santos Cristina, 33, lives with her life companion and children a few kilometers from the nation's capital in one of the most populous cities in the country. She buys and sells cardboard, plastics, and recyclable materials. She has been doing this for several years with good results. Last month she generated a good profit, buying material in different neighborhoods near her home. She has several willing buyers and sellers because they know she is honest and hardworking. Her work is the source of funds for sustaining her household, and she is always fighting to achieve her dreams. 

She believes that one need not fear the future if one faces it, because it is full of successes. She needs to invest more and cannot do this without requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy cardboard, plastics, bottles, etc. Santos Cristina has the credit capacity to pay the loan, as well as good references and an excellent sense of responsibility. She hopes to be able to provide her family with the fuller life they deserve.

loans.use: to buy cardboard, plastics, and bottles.

loans.name: Silverio Angel

texts.es: Silverio Ángel  de cincuenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, toda su vida ha trabajado en la agricultura y eso le ha regalado una valiosa experiencia a la hora de la siembra, pertenece a una cooperativa agrícola que le facilita ciertos aspectos del cultivo, Silverio es muy conocido porque siempre obtiene las mejores cosechas, a la hora de comerciar los clientes lo prefieren  porque tiene productos de calidad y a precios muy accesibles además el servicio es excelente;  es un hombre emprendedor, cien por ciento dedicado a su labor, le gusta aprovechar cada oportunidad que se le presenta, piensa que en el mundo hay un mar de posibilidades que nos permitirán triunfar. Su primera posibilidad es hacer crecer el negocio pero necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, insecticida y herramienta; Silverio Ángel posee buenas referencias crediticias y está dispuesto a asumir la responsabilidad de pago del financiamiento además así con esfuerzo podrá darle a su familia un vida plena.
texts.en: Silverio Angel, 55, lives with his life partner and their children in his own house.  He is a farmer who cultivates corn and beans.  He has worked all of his life in agriculture, and this gives him valuable experience to draw on when he puts in a new crop.  He belongs to an agricultural cooperative that facilitates certain aspects of farming for him.  Silverio is very well known, because he always gets the best harvests.  When he goes to sell, the customers prefer him because he has quality products at affordable prices, and his service is excellent.  His is an enterprising man who is 100 % dedicated to his work.  He likes to take advantage of every opportunity that presents itself, and he believes that in this world there is an ocean of possibilities that will allow us to succeed.  His first responsibility is to make his business grow, but he needs to invest in supplies.  For this reason, he is requesting  loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy corn and bean seeds, insecticides, and tools.  Silverio Angel has good credit references and is ready to take on the responsibility of making the payments on this loan.  This way, with a lot of effort, he will be able to give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, insecticides, and tools

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
La señora Maria Magdalena esta casada, tiene 37 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 4 hijos 2 de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica al tejido de fajas, inicio este trabajo con el apoyo de un familiar y al momento lleva 10 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para para la compra de hilos de varios colores y poder elaborar mas fajas para mas ingreso. Espera en el futuro tener un negocio grande.
texts.en:
Maria Magdalena is married. She is 37 years old and didn't have the opportunity to go to school. She has four children, two of them in school. She works making wide woven bands of material, which are worn around the waist. She got started in this line of work with the support of a relative, and has ten years of experience so far.

She is requesting a loan, which she will use to purchase different color threads so that she can weave more bands and generate more income. In the future she hopes to have a large business.

loans.use: to purchase materials for weaving.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es: Luis Alonso de 34 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar el cual está integrado por su esposa, dos hijos, padres y una hermana.  Desde hace mucho tiempo comenzó a cultivar la tierra y a ganarse la vida de esta forma. Él se dedica al cultivo y comercialización de maíz. Junto a su esposa buscan la forma de dar lo mejor a sus hijos. Trabajan muy duro ya que su deseo es darles una vida diferente a la que ellos han tenido.  El señor Luis es muy conocido en la zona donde habita, como un hombre trabajador, responsable y honrado. Ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus vecinos los cuales siempre buscan sus productos cuando la cosecha esta lista. Solicita este credito para invertir en la compra  de los insumos necesario (abonos, insecticidas, etc) para la siembra,  debido a  que la temporada ya comenzó y es necesario iniciar la siembra lo antes posible y estar preparado, cabe mencionar que de esta forma es como sostiene la economía de su hogar y no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
Luis Alonso, 34, lives in his own house with his family, which comprises his wife, two children, parents, and a sister. Many years ago, he started working the land and earning his living this way. He cultivates and sells corn. He and his wife are seeking a way to give their children the best they can. They work very hard because they wish to offer their children a different life than the one they have had.

Luis is well known in his neighborhood as a hardworking, responsible, honorable man. He has gained the trust of his neighbors, who always look for his products when the harvest is ready. He is requesting this loan to purchase needed agricultural supplies for planting (fertilizers, insecticides, etc.) because the season has already started, and he must begin planting and be prepared as soon as possible. This is how he supports his family, and he has no other income source.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Roxana Abigail

texts.es: Roxana Abigail de veinticinco años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo; ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol y es una de sus principales fuentes de ingreso, también vende tortas y hamburguesas y le da buenos resultados; es una gran negociante y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues en todo lo que comercia es de excelente calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles; Roxana es una mujer muy activa, trabajadora y visionaria, piensa que aprovechar las grandes oportunidades la llevaran al éxito por eso siempre está a la expectativa de no dejar ir ninguna, quiere expandir el negocio para obtener mejores ganancias por eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz y frijol, fertilizante ,  insecticida herramienta, etc. Roxana Abigail posee buenas referencias de pago y tiene la certeza que podrá responder al financiamiento con puntualidad; a la vez tiene fe que podrá darle a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en: Roxana Abigail, 25, lives with her life partner and their child.  She is a farmer who cultivates corn and beans, and this activity is one of her main sources of income.  She also sells sandwiches and hamburgers, which gives her good results.  She is a great businesswoman, and she has gained a lot of customers, because everything she sells is of excellent quality and she sells at affordable prices.  Roxana is active woman who is hardworking and forward-looking.  She believes that by taking advantage of great opportunities she will become successful, and so for this reason she is always on the lookout, never wanting to let an opportunity slip by.  She wants to expand her business so that she can have better earnings. This is why she decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizers, insecticides, tools, etc.  Roxana Abigail has good credit references, and she is certain that she will be able to pay back the loan on time.  Also, she has faith that this will allow her to provide her family with a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizers, insecticides and tools

loans.name: Joaquín Adalberto

texts.es: Joaquín Adalberto, es un joven de 21 años de edad y habita junto a su madre. Joaquín es caracterizado y conocido como un joven  trabajador, amable y responsable. Desde muy niño aprendió a cultivar la tierra. Esto le ha permitido ganarse el sustento diario de forma honrada, y costearse los estudios. Su deseo es terminar su educación para tener acceso a un empleo y poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Necesita comenzar a cultivar la tierra con los principales granos básicos que cada año siembra (maíz y frijoles) ya que por medio de los ingresos que recibe después de vender la cosecha, es como logra cubrir las necesidades más básicas de su hogar y pagarse sus estudios.  Solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en los insumos agrícolas como: semilla de maíz y frijol, abonos e insecticidas y pagar el alquiler de las dos manzanas de tierra que usa para el cultivo. Sueña con algún día ser un profesional, no pierde las esperanzas que con su trabajo logrará lo que tanto desea.
texts.en:
Joaquín Adalberto, 21, lives with his mother.  Joaquín is described and known as a hardworking, kind, and responsible young man.  He learned to work the land from a very young age.  This has allowed him to earn a daily living honorably and pay for his studies.  His desire is to finish his education to get  a job and be able to improve his and his family's quality of life.

He needs to start farming his land with the main staples he grows every year (corn and beans) because he is able to cover his basic household necessities and pay for his studies with the income he gets from selling the harvest.

He is requesting this loan from Integral to invest in agricultural supplies such as corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, and insecticide, and to pay the rent on the two "manzanas" [manzana = 7000 square meters]  of land he uses for the crop.

He dreams about being a professional one day.  He is not losing hope that, with his job, he will achieve what he most desires.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, and insecticide.

loans.name: Fidelina Ángel

texts.es: Fidelina Ángel tiene 65 años de edad y  habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su hija y nietos. Su esposo falleció hace  algunos años, desde entonces ha tenido que asumir varias de las responsabilidades que dejará su esposo.  La señora  Fidelina se dedica al cultivo de la tierra desde hace varios años. Dicha activad la realiza año con año junto con sus nietos los cuales le ayudan en la siembra de los granos básicos.  Después de sacar la cosecha, la pone a la venta ya que de esta forma lleva el sustento a su hogar. Es una mujer trabajadora que a pesar de su avanzada edad no se cansa de luchar por una mejor calidad de vida.  Cuenta con mucho reconocimiento en la zona donde habita  ya que gracias a su generosidad y buen desempeño en su trabajo  se ha ganado el respeto de muchos de sus vecinos. Es importante mencionar que habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su familia. Todo esto la motiva a seguir trabajando por una mejor calidad de vida.  Solicita este crédito a esta institución para invertir en la compra de insumos agrícolas (abonos, semillas, insecticidas, etc.) para dar inicio a la siembra.  Con el objetivo de continuar llevando el sustento a su hogar y lograr su sueño de dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Fidelina Ángel, age 64, lives in her own house with her daughter and grandchildren.  Her husband died some years ago, and since then she has had to assume various responsibilities that had been her husband’s.

Fidelina has devoted herself to cultivating the land for several years.  She does this business activity, year after year, with her grandchildren.  They help her grow basic grains.  She sells the crops after they have been harvested, and this is the way she supports her household.

She is a hard-working woman.  In spite of her advanced age, she does not tire of fighting for a better quality of life.  She says that she is very well-known in the area.  Thanks to her generosity and good work performance, she has won the respect of a lot of her neighbors.

It is important to mention that she lives in very humble conditions together with her family.  All of this motivates her to continue working for a better quality of life.

She is requesting this loan to buy agricultural supplies (fertilizers, seeds, and insecticides, etc.) in order to start planting.  Her objective for doing this is to continue supporting her household.  Her dream is to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds, and insecticides, etc.

loans.name: Julio Oscar

texts.es: Julio Oscar de cincuenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus cinco hijos en casa propia; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene varios años de experiencia en la agricultura y eso le da lo oportunidad de obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno está ubicado cerca de su vivienda y una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y comercia en todas las zonas aledañas al lugar, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues saben que sus productos son de calidad y a un buen precio además el servicio es excelente; Julio Oscar es un hombre  emprendedor con todo el entusiasmo de salir adelante y buscar el éxito, quiere hacer crecer el negocio por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz y frijol, fertilizantes y herramienta; Julio Oscar tiene buen record crediticio, es confiable y está seguro que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en: Julio Oscar is 56 years old.  He lives together with his life partner and their five children in his own home.  His business is growing corn and beans and he has years of farming experience.  This enables him to enjoy very good harvests.  Julio Oscar's land is located near his home, in an area which is very busy with agricultural activity.  He sells his produce in neighboring areas.  He has a lot of customers because they know that he sells good-quality produce, at a good price, and provides an excellent service.  Julio Oscar is an entrepreneurial man who is very keen to do well in life and achieve success.  He would like to grow his business and so is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizers and tools.  Julio Oscar has a good credit record.  He is trustworthy and is certain that he will be able to repay his loan and, at the same time, provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizers and tools

loans.name: Jose Virgilio

texts.es: José Virgilio de treinta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en este rubro y tiene mucha experiencia, también posee una venta de cerdos que le ayuda a complementar los gastos del hogar, comercía en todas las zonas aledañas a su vivienda y tiene mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que comercia es de excelente calidad y a un buen precio además el servicio es inigualable don José es muy amable con las personas; es un hombre visionario con muchas metas a futuro sabe que si pone todo su esfuerzo y dedicación logrará el éxito; en la última cosecha tuvo un poco de perdida, debido a las fuertes tormentas que hecho a perder su maíz,  por eso quiere recuperarse e invertir pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz y frijol, herbicidas, fertilizante, etc. José Virgilio no tiene experiencia crediticia, pero tiene muy buenas referencia de vecinos y conocidos, tiene la confianza que pagara con éxito la deuda, al mismo tiempo sabe que podrá ofreceré a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en:
José Virgilio, age 38, lives with his life partner and their children.  He devotes himself to agriculture.  Specifically, he grows corn and beans.  He has been doing this work for several years, and he has a lot of experience.

He also sells pigs, which helps to cover the household expenses.  He does business in all of the areas surrounding his house, and he has a lot of customers.  They know that everything he sells is of excellent quality and at a good price.  Also, his service is unparalleled. 

José is very kind to people.  He is a visionary man with a lot of goals for the future.  He knows that if he puts forth all of his efforts and devotion he will manage to be successful.  During the last harvest he had a bit of a loss due to the strong storms that made him lose his corn.

Therefore, he wants to recover and invest.  However, he needs capital.  That is why he is requesting a loan from Integral.  He will use the loan to buy corn and bean seeds, herbicides, and fertilizers, etc.

José Virgilio does not have loan history, but he has very good references from his neighbors and acquaintances.  He is confident that he will successfully repay the debt.  At the same time, he knows that he will be able to provide his family with a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, herbicides, and fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Anabel Moran

texts.es: Anabel de treinta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella posee un chalet en una escuela cercana a la localidad donde reside, ya tiene varios años con el negocio y le ha dado resultado, le deja muy buenas ganancias, sus clientes la prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesita tortas, hamburguesas, golosinas, bebidas entre otros, todo de excelente calidad y a precios bajos además se caracteriza por ser muy amable con todos; Anabel es una mujer emprendedora dispuesta a trabajar duro para lograr sus sueños;  quiere invertir más en el negocio porque ya no le alcanzan los productos, pero necesita un apoyo económico por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar pan, embutidos, carnes, golosinas, bebidas etc. Anabel tiene buenas referencias de pago, es muy responsable por eso asegura que podrá saldar la deuda en el tiempo establecido y al mismo tiempo le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Anabel is 35 years old and lives together with her life partner and children.  She owns a snack bar in a school near her town.  She has been in her business for a number of years and it has provided her with good results.  She makes very good profits and her customers are loyal to her business because she always has what they need: pies, hamburgers, candies, drinks, etc.  All of her products are top quality and she sells them at low prices.  She is also noted for the kindness with which she treats everybody.

Anabel is an entrepreneurial woman who is ready to work hard in order to fulfill her dreams.  She would like to invest further in her business because she doesn't have enough products.  However, she needs financial support and is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that she can buy bread, cold cuts, meat, candies, drinks, etc.  Anabel has good credit references and is very responsible.  She is certain that she will be able to repay her loan on time and, at the same time, offer her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy bread, cold cuts, meat, candies and drinks

loans.name: Doris Elizabeth

texts.es: Doris Elizabeth, habita junto a su hija desde hace más de 15 años. Trabaja duramente para ganarse el pan de cada día y cubrir las cuotas de la casa, ya que desde hace varios años se decidió en comenzar a pagar una casa con el fondo social de vivienda del país.  Ella se dedica al comercio de tienda. Desde hace 7 años comenzó con la venta de variedad de productos alimenticios, bebidas gaseosas y endulzadas, productos de limpieza, etc.  Es una mujer increíble, ya que hace todo lo que está a su alcance para sacar adelante a su familia. Tiene muchas ideas de negocio las cuales poco apoco va poniendo en marcha. Además de su tienda también se dedica al comercio de medicina de, manera ambulante. Es muy conocida en la zona y gracias a su carisma se ganado la confianza de muchas personas en la zona donde habita. Como toda una mujer visionaria, ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en mercadería de tienda (bebidas, azúcar, arroz, frijoles, macarrones, aceite, productos de limpieza, etc.)  para surtir su negocio, con el fin de mejorar sus ventas e ingresos y por consecuencia mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Doris Elizabeth has been living together with her daughter for more than 15 years.  She works hard in order to put bread on the table and cover their household expenses.  Some years ago, she decided to start paying for a house with money from a national social housing fund.  Her business is running a store.  She started out seven years ago selling a variety of food products, sodas, snacks, cleaning products, etc.  She is an incredible woman who does everything in her power to provide for her family.  She has many business ideas which she is gradually putting into practice.  In addition to running her store, Doris Elizabeth also sells medicines as an itinerant vendor.  She is very well known in her area and, thanks to her charm, she has gained the trust of many people in her area.  As she is a women with plans, she has taken the decision to request this loan from INTEGRAL so that she can invest in buying merchandise for her store (drinks, sugar, rice, beans, macaroni, oil, cleaning products, etc.) and stock her business.  This will enable her to improve her sales and income and thereby improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy drinks, sugar, rice, beans, macaroni, oil, cleaning products,etc.

loans.name: Rukiyamo

texts.ru: Рукиямо десять лет занимается растениеводством. Она в основном выращивает бахчевые культуры. Ей 43 года. Она замужем. Ее муж работает учителем. Она берет кредит для закупа семян и селитры.
texts.en: Rukiyamo has been involved in agriculture for ten years.  She primarily grows melon crops.  She is 43 years old, married.  Her husband works as a teacher.  Rukiyamo is requesting this loan to buy seeds and saltpetre.

loans.use: to buy seeds and saltpetre

loans.name: Francia Elena

texts.es:
Francia es una persona muy trabajadora que ha logrado salir adelante y progresar junto a su familia gracias al esfuerzo que hace diariamente para brindarles a su esposo y su hijo de 5 años una buena calidad de vida. Francia tiene experiencia en ventas, ya que trabajó durante mucho tiempo en un almacén de venta de productos de uso personal, y ahora que quiere montar su propio negocio quiere aprovechar esta experiencia y sacar su propio negocio adelante. Francia quiere iniciar su propio negocio motivada principalmente porque considera que su empleo no era bien remunerado, y ahora quiere entonces aumentar sus ingresos para que su esposo y su hijo tengan una mejor calidad de vida. El negocio que montará será una miscelánea en la cual ofrecerá una gran variedad de productos como papelería, productos de uso personal, cosméticos, entre otros, y además de esto ofrecerá el servicio de fotografía ya que tomó un curso de fotografía hace un tiempo. Con el ánimo entonces de comprar lo necesario para su negocio, Francia busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una impresora, una vitrina y surtido de mercancía para montar su miscelánea.
De esta manera podrá cumplir su sueño de tener su propio negocio y así tener mejores ingresos para contribuir económicamente en su hogar y brindar en su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Francia sueña con progresar junto a su familia y tener mejores oportunidades económicas en su hogar.
texts.en:
Francia is a hardworking individual who has been able to move forward and progress with her family. Thanks to her efforts each day, she is able to provide her husband and five-year-old son a good quality of life. Francia has sales experience. She has worked for a long time at a store that sells personal use products. Francia now wants to establish a business and utilize her experience in order to get ahead.

Her primary motivation for starting her own business is that her job does not pay very well. Now she wants to increase her income so that her husband and son can have a better quality of life. The business she plans to set up will be a variety store that offers a wide selection of merchandise such as stationery, personal use products, and other items. Francia will also offer photo services since she took a photography course some time ago. She is eager to buy what she needs for her business.

Francia is seeking a loan that will give her the opportunity to purchase a printer, a display case, and an inventory of merchandise so that she can open her variety store. This will help her fulfill her dream of having her own business, thus allowing her to generate more income for contributing financially to her household and for providing her family a better quality of life. Francia hopes to progress with her family and have better financial opportunities for her home.

loans.use: to purchase a printer, a display case, and merchandise for her variety store.

loans.name: María Tomasa

texts.es: María Tomasa tiene 39 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad, situada en zona urbana, desde hace más de 18 años. Vive junto a su hijo el cual es mayor de edad y ayuda con la economía del hogar. Ella se dedica  a la venta de frutas desde hace 6 años. El  negocio está ubicado en el mercado central de la zona donde ella habita, lugar que es muy concurrido y visitado, en especial el puesto de María. Es muy conocida en la zona ya que siempre mantiene variedad de fruta fresca a muy buenos precios.  Gracias al buen desempeño de su trabajo ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchos vecinos los cuales día a día la prefieren más.  Debido a que quiere dar un impulso a su negocio, ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para que le den una ayuda en la compra de variedad de frutas (mangos, piñas, manzanas, sandías, naranjas, etc.) , con el fin de atraer a más clientes que le permitan incrementar sus ventas e ingresos y por consecuencia su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
María Tomasa, age 38, has lived in her own house in an urban zone for over 18 years.  She lives with her adult son, and he helps with the household expenses.

She has been selling fruit for six years.  Her business is located in the central market in the zone where she lives.  The place is very crowded and well visited, especially María’s stand. She is very well-known in the zone because she always has a variety of fresh fruit for very good prices.  

Thanks to her good work performance she has known how to win over the confidence of a lot of her neighbors.  They prefer her more each day.

Due to the fact that she wants to give her business a boost, she has made the decision to request a loan from Integral.  The loan will help her buy a variety of fruits (mangoes, pineapples, apples, watermelons, and oranges, etc.).  She will do this in order to attract more customers, which will allow her to increase her sales and income.  As a consequence, she will improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy mangoes, pineapples, apples, watermelons, and oranges, etc.

loans.name: Las Orquideas Group

texts.es: La  Alcancía Comunal “Las Orquideas” es un grupo que tiene 04 meses de antigüedad y  está conformado por  06 mujeres emprendedoras, siendo Yeny la tesorera del grupo, cargo que ha llevado con responsabilidad. Yeny de 33 años, es separada y  tiene 02 hijos, aún dependientes. Actualmente se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, la cual trabaja sobre pedidos. Este negocio comenzó gracias a su vecina que  fue quien la motivo a emprender su propio negocio.  Con los trabajos que realizo y el buen uso que le dio a sus ingresos pudo comprarse su propio terreno, y de esta manera mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos. Su siguiente meta es de habilitar una bodega donde pueda ofrecer productos de primera necesidad. Su último crédito lo destinara para capital de trabajo la cual comprara colonias, perfumes, talcos, etc  ya que piensa ofrecerlo por el  día del padre. Yeny es la primera del lado izquierdo y viste polo rosado y casaca a cuadros.
texts.en:
The “Las Orquídeas”(The Orchids) communal bank has been in existence for four months and it has six women members; Yeny is group Treasurer, an office she’s held with responsibility.

Yeny, 33, is separated and has two children still dependent on her.  She currently works selling beauty products on order.  She started the business thanks to a neighbor who motivated her to start her own business.  With the work she did and the good use she put her income to she was able to buy herself a piece of land thus improving her children’s quality of life.

Her next goal is to set up a store where she can sell basic staple items.  She will use this most recent loan as working capital; she will buy colognes, perfumes, talc, etc. because she plans to sell them for Father’s Day.  

Yeny is the first one on the left wearing a pink shirt and a jacked with squares.

loans.use: to buy perfume, talc and cologne.

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es:
Luzmila es una mujer joven, amable y trabajadora. Está casada y tiene dos hijos, de 10 años y el menor de 4 años. La casa donde viven en su casa propia, y trabaja mucho para brindarl una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
Su trabajo es la venta de productos para el hogar como: sábanas, frazadas, ollas, sartenes, cortinas, bandejas y otros. Sale a vender por las diversas calles de su ciudad desde hace un año. Se inició vendiendo productos pequeños y en menores cantidades, ahora vende mucho y le va muy bien, tiene la ayuda de su esposo, con quien tienen un ritmo de trabajo muy bueno y siempre son muy organizados. Ya que tiene muchos clientes y no se olvida de visitarlos al menos una vez al mes para ver si tienen necesidad de algún producto. Otro punto que considera muy bueno de su lado, es el hecho de poder disponer de su tiempo y brindar cuidado a sus menores hijos que la necesitan mucho. Al principio cuando empezó tenía la dificultad de no saber cómo a convencer a sus clientes, pero a base de esfuerzo pudo hacerlo. Ahora sí genera ingresos y su familia puede vivir con cierta tranquilidad. Su deseo a futuro es poder tener un local propio y no tener que estar caminando por mucho tiempo.

Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por tanto está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero para avanzar con su trabajo. Por otro lado, se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas y no dejar mal al grupo que le está dando la oportunidad de poder incrementar su capital de trabajo, respaldándola en su banco comunal.
Con el monto solicitado, 1500 soles, comprará más productos para seguir con su trabajo. Esta vez comprará en mayor cantidad sábanas y frazadas.
texts.en:
Luzmila is a kind, hardworking young woman.  She’s married and has two children who are 10 and 4 years old.  The house they live in is hers and she works very hard to give her family a better quality of life.
